Great variety at breakfast - if you don't like the hot options there was always much more - smoothies, bagels, fruit, muffins etc.  One day we had to be at Good Morning America at 6:00 am and they had grab and go breakfast ready in a bag at the front desk and we grabbed a coffee and ate breakfast in line for GMA.  Not buying breakfast or coffee saved us a lot in NYC!   It was also nice that the hotel had water, coffee, tea etc available in the lobby 24/7 and cookies often as well.  
Everyone we encountered at Hampton was friendly and eager to help in any way needed.  Good value for the money - we paid ~$350 per night but remember you are in the heart of Manhattan and breakfast included.  We ended up getting Sunday night half price through a Hilton Honors promotion.  
On a side note - had dinner at the bar next door (Gleason's Tavern) one night when we were tired and food was great and enjoyed talking to bartender and a few locals.

title: Great location and reasonable price
text:
Hotel location is great and the price we paid through Agoda was quite reasonable by New York standard. We stayed here for four nights during September 2019 in a two double bed room.
Check in and out was fast and efficient. Room and bathroom size was good. Room amenities included tea/coffee facility, room safe and standard bathroom supplies. The entire hotel was very clean and housekeeping did a good job.
The staff we came across was helpful and efficient. We organized our car to Newark airport through the hotel and the price was ok and service timely.
We could not check out the rooftop view but view from the room was fine.
There is a small shop at the lobby for soft drinks and similar items which was helpful for us. The hotel also provides free tea and coffee at the lobby.
Considering what I have written so far it should have been five stars but I cannot give that due to problem with elevators and breakfast.
As mentioned by others, there are only three elevators and it is not enough for a hotel of this size during the morning rush hours which starts around 8 am. We had to wait for nearly twenty minutes to get into the elevator one day. If you are going to the airport in the morning then make sue you have sufficient time in hand.
The hotel provides breakfast which in included in the room rate. The food was ok but the size of the breakfast room is too small with insufficient seating arrangements. Unless you start your breakfast before 7 am getting a table is doubtful. In fact we had to skip the hotel breakfast one day as there were no place to sit and it was way beyond over crowded. Please note there is no other restaurant at the hotel.
As a conclusion if you are looking for central location, decent price and a clean hotel and will not mind avoiding the morning rush and skip hotel breakfast then this is highly recommended.

title: Great hotel
text:
We had a 10 days stay and we only have good things to say:
- all staff are fantastic helpful. 
- room had an OK size with a kingsize bed, a big TV with lots of channels and a very nice bathroom with a big shower. Only thing was that the aircon was a bit loud, but it works fine and is easy to adjust.
- access to washing machine, dryer and fitness in the basement.
I would like to point out that the breakfast (managed by Geraldine) in our opinion was very good. Others have said it was simple and basic but it has all you need for a good start, all is fresh and the service is great.

title: Service second to none
text: Spectacular service and extreme professionalism working with Lily, Farrell, Will, Geraldine, Benson & Johnny.  They treated us like family and it absolutely impacted our fun experience!  We will definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family.  Keep up the great work!!!

title: Lage und Zimmer okay, Personal nicht hilfreich, Frühstück schrecklich
text: Lage und Zimmer sind okay, aber das Frühstück ist bei dem Preis des Hotels absolut inakzeptabel: Eiskalter Raum, viel zu eng, nur Plastikgeschirr, wenig Auswahl (außer für Süßigkeiten). Und das Personal ist nicht hilfsbereit und reagiert entweder nicht oder nur mit leiser Stimme in der lauten Lobby.

title: I love NY Hampton Inn Times Square Central
text:
Stayed for 3 nights and had a blast.
Excellent location close all the theaters, attractions, restaurants that Times Square has to offer. 
Complementary Full hot breakfast and Wifi throughout the hotel is a plis. Just minutes walk to  the Subway, Bryant Park and Wholefoods

title: Nice hotel near theaters.
text: This is a very nice hotel and the staff was very helpful and personable. This is in a good location near theaters and subway. Close to Bryant Park.  It is nice to be able to depend on the Hampton brand.

title: Fantastic service, brilliant location
text: This hotel was so central for everything in Times Square, and easy reach of the subways.  The staff were absolutely fantastic and couldn’t do enough for us.  Highly recommend this hotel, and we’ll definitely return.

title: Excelente hotel.
text: Un hotel con una ubicacion excelente. La atencion recibida por el perspnal de la empresa fue exquisita en todo momento. Las habitaciones super limpias y acogedoras. Igualmente los servicios de desayuno.

title: Decent value, but nothing special.
text: Decent value, but nothing special. We've stayed at other Hilton hotels in the area and would probably recommend them. The rooms and bathrooms are very small and crowded- the staff was very friendly and helpful

title: Very well located, nice hotel
text:
We chose this hotel for its  location at Times Square, close to many attractions, and by its convenient price. 
The room was comfortable and clean, good beds and ample bathroom. Both the room and the common areas are well kept and feel almost new.
The staff was very friendly and helpful. 
Breakfast is included and it gets crowded at rush hour. But with a little patience we always managed to get a table. There are also snacks sold at the lobby and complimetary coffee.
Definitely a good experience and we will be coming back.

title: Comfortable hotel
text: This hotel is ideally placed for sight seeing in New York just seconds from Times Square. The staff are lovely and friendly. The buffet breakfast gets you off to a good start. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

title: Pas tip top
text:
Hôtel bien placé mais un peu à l'étroit. Tout est tout petit. Les ascenseurs servent aussi pour le personnel alors on peut attendre parfois 15 minutes sur le palier de la chambre avant qu'un ascenseur arrive (on faisait la queue avec la femme de ménage et son aspirateur et le monsieur d'entretien avec le bac de linges)
La salle de petit déjeuner est une horreur, trop petite du coup pas de place pour tout le monde et personne ne place les gens... c'est un peu la guerre pour trouver une table !
Le petit déjeuner est copieux mais sa coupe l'appétit de rester debout le temps qu'une table se libère. 
Chambre très petite et du coup pas de place pour les valises surtout à 3 personnes

title: Lovely hotel
text:
Stayed here for 4 nights the hotel is in a great location just a minute walk and you are in the heart of Times Square.
The hotel was clean with a good selection for breakfast.
The staff was helpful and welcoming. Loved the free selection of hot drinks which was available all day and night. 
Would definitely recommend.

title: ミュージカル鑑賞目的ならおすすめ
text: アラジンだけだなく他のシアターも近いので、ミュージカル鑑賞には良いと思います。NYCは物価が高いので、ロビーにコーヒーや水（ペットボトル持参の人も）があること、そこそこ満足できる朝食があることはポイントが高いと思います。

title: For $312 a night, I expect a lot more!
text: This hotel is not worth $312+taxes! The room was clean, but very dated. The shower head fell off while I was in the shower! Breakfast was a chaotic mess that was truly a survival of the fittest! There were few breakfast choices and it was difficult finding a seat. Trash cans were overflowing and in desperate need of attention. We’ve stayed in Hamptons many times and have always found them to be nice, clean hotels and a great value. Hampton should be embarrassed by this Times Square property!!!!

title: Good choice for a central location
text:
If a central location is important this hotel is a solid choice. Despite being so close to Times Square the hotel rooms are quiet and comfortable. Plenty of restaurants, deli s and food options around, not high quality in this area but good enough after a days sightseeing. Only 5mins from the hoho bus stop. 
There’s a small selection of snacks, a microwave and free tea and coffee in the foyer and a coffee machine in the room. No fridge though, which is a bit of a shame. Observation deck on 31st floor open until 7pm for good views of the skyline.
Breakfast is, as others have said, very basic - plastic cutlery and paper cups and plates. Front desk are a bit laid back - this is not the Hilton! But it’s very clean, comfortable and good value. Oh; should you need it the aircon is quite noisy; but the window does open a few inches!

title: Fantástica new york
text:
Hotel central perto de estação de ônibus, metrô, parques!
Café da manhã muito bom! Funcionários super atenciosos! Fácil para fazer check in e check out! Fácil deixar as malas antes e depois de ingressar no hotel

title: Great Quite Central Manhattan Location
text:
We chose the Hampton because of its location on West 41st and we were not disappointed. 
WE arrived early afternoon and our room 1203 was ready, although it did not have a great view as we were at the rear of the hotel it was clean of a good size and very quite, the beds were some of the best we have slept in and the shower was powerful and hot.
But it is all  about location you are minutes away from the subway and bus stations and 10 minutes walk from Hells Kitchen and Bryant Park 15 from the Empire State Building, Times Square is literally around the corner.
We were up early so no queues for either the lifts or breakfast which was varied and more than  adequate to set you up for a day pounding the streets of New York. The all day free tea coffee and hot chocolate was much appreciated.
The hotel is busy but reception staff were always available to answer questions, we had an afternoon flight and a late complimentary check out and secure luggage store made our day.
Overall an excellent mid range hotel that goes above and beyond. WE would defiantly stay again and would highly recommend to others.

title: Excelente ubicación
text: Excelente ubicación y muy buen trato. Muy práctica la botella de agua que te ofrecen para cuando salís a conocer NYC y el desayuno expres que te ofrecen en la recepción si no tenes tiempo para el desayuno en la cafetería.

title: Good location to visit Manhattan
text:
A very good place. The location is very good to visit the heart of Manhattan. Very close to Time Square, near from Central Park, Madison Square Garden and Penn Station and others places to visit in midtown. The room was very pleasant and very clean. The breakfast was good. 
I recommand this place.

title: Great location for all things NYC!
text: Great location for seeing Broadway shows.  Easy access to Port Authority and NYC subway.  Very impressed with every encounter with staff.  Clean & friendly.  Very good breakfast.  Room was 3006 - and surprisingly quiet.

title: Brilliant location, nice clean rooms, great staff
text: We chose this hotel for the location and managed to walk everywhere! Hotel spotlessly clean, great staff including cleaning staff and reception but the best was Geraldine who manages the breakfast room, what a lovely lady so friendly and efficient and even remembered guests who had returned after 5 months! Weekends breakfast room is very busy but week days not so much. Good selection available every day.

title: Friendly Staff.
text: This hotel is 5 to 10 minutes walking distance to Times square. I stayed for 6 days. Complimentary breakfast. Friendly staffs at breakfast area and friendly front desk. Clean hotel. Will stay again. Thank you.

title: regular and expensive
text: this hotel is expensive for regular hotel ,small room , cleanliness is regular not perfect , the free breakfast is only a free line ,but the worst is the time lost waiting for the elevator , never less than 10 minutes

title: Emplacement idéal
text: Emplacement idéal proche de toutes commodités, chambre spacieuse et silencieuse ce qui est un atout à New-York et petit déjeuner inclus. Café et thé à disposition dans le hall de l'hôtel à toute heure.

title: Angenehmer Aufenthalt
text:
Zimmer und Ausstattung okay. Sauberkeit okay, Reinigung und Tausch der Handtücher fand täglich statt. 

Frühstück ist für deutschen Standard ausbaufähig. Kaffee konnte man trinken, ansonsten gab es Toast, Muffins, Omelett und Waffeln. Joghurt gab es ebenfalls und in Plastik verpacktes Obst. 
Der Raum aufgrund seiner Größe und der viel zu vielen Gäste, leider ungemütlich. 

Fazit: wenn man auf sein Frühstück verzichten kann oder sich mit einem Kaffee zufrieden gibt ist das Hampton Inn ein gutes, sehr zentrales Hotel mit direkter Lage am Time Square und freundlichem Personal.

title: I don’t agree with other reviews
text: I disagree with other reviews. Room was very small 2 people barely fit in the room. Bathroom will only accommodate 1 person with a very tight fit. Had an issue with a tub that didn’t drain & needed maintenance. Adequate towels were not stocked, we had to call down daily for more. Carpet was separating. Comforter was piled. Sheets were marked with black streaks. Breakfast food and quality were inconsistent. Beds are very small for 2 people. Hallway has no air flow. Hall noise especially door slamming can be heard inside room. Still waiting on unresolved credit. At $349 per night I didn’t consider it a value. Parking is $58 per night.

title: consigliatissimo!
text: posizione strategica, hall disponibilissima, ogni giorno cambio lenzuola, si dorme benissimo, multi prese in camera, colazione un po' ripetitiva ma forse e' l'unico difetto. Mr John della consierge un vero portento nell'aiutare

title: New York Break
text: We spent the last 4 days of our holiday in New York and the hotel was a perfect location for visiting most of the tourist attractions we visited.The staff were very friendly and helpful. The complimentary breakfast was good although the restaurant could be very busy.

title: Ottima soluzione per visitare New York
text: L'hotel si trova in ottima posizione a due passi da Times Square e dalla fermata della metro. Le camere sono ampie per gli standard di New York, pulite e curate. Dal trentesimo piano la vista è fantastica. La colazione è servita in una sala un po' piccola, meglio scendere prima delle 8 per evitare di non trovare posto. La colazione è buona, con dolci, waffle, salati e bevande calde e fredde. In omaggio i clienti ricevono ogni giorno le bottigliette di acqua. Il personale è molto cortese. Ci torneremmo sicuramente.

title: Sehr gutes Innenstadthotel
text:
Top Innenstadthotel 
Hotel liegt ideal 2 Min von Times Square und 5 Min von Bryant Park/5th Avenue.

Metro 1 Min von Hotel.

Für USA sehr gutes Frühstück im Preis inbegriffen. Betten mittelharz. Empfehlenswertes Hotel.

title: Good hotel but versus qualité over priced
text: We were desperate the hotel we had booked cancelled our reservation and being Friday night in Time Square area, we had little choice. I told our situation to the staff , still we were charged prime rate still no extra benefit. Breakfast not worth extra pay.

title: Ubicación Inmejorable, hotel con muchas áreas de oportunidad
text: Sin duda el mejor atributo de este hotel es su ubicación; se encuentra a media cuadra de la estación 42st Times Square del metro, que cuenta con accesos a todas las líneas de dicho transporte, lo que permite que transportarse hacia cualquier punto de la ciudad sea súper sencillo. Además, está a una cuadra de Gray Line, por lo que si quieres ir al Outlet Woodbury Common es muy sencillo tomar el transporte y regresar con tus compras y dejarlas muy fácil en el hotel. En cuanto a las habitaciones, considero que respecto otros hoteles en Nueva York deben ser de un tamaño standard, aunque comparadas con otros destinos, son pequeñas. La limpieza de las habitaciones bastante bien. Algo positivo del hotel, es que en el lobby colocan las 24 horas, agua caliente y fría así como café, y varias opciones de tés, lo cual como turista, se agradece bastante. Sin embargo, creo que hay varios detalles que podrían mejorar dentro del hotel. En primer lugar, el elevador es sumamente lento, puedes tardarte en bajar al rededor de 15 minutos, por que se tarda mucho en llegar a tu piso, sobretodo en ciertos horarios que se llena. Igualmente el desayuno, a partir de las 8 de la mañana se satura de una manera espantosa, es imposible encontrar mesa y se vuelve todo un desorden la zona del comedor, no es nada placentero bajar a desayunar. Considero que el espacio es totalmente insuficiente para la cantidad de huéspedes del hotel. Justo en estos horarios, también el elevador llega a sus horarios pico, y es cuando más te tardas en bajar. La calidad del desayuno es bastante normal, ofrecen alguna opción de huevos y otra proteína (Salchichas o carne), fruta (muy poca variedad, un poco de melón en no las mejores condiciones, manzanas y uvas) yogurts, waffles, bagels, jugo, café, té y algunas otras pocas opciones de pan. Algo con lo que deberían tener cuidado es con el trato a los huéspedes, a diferencia de otros hoteles de la cadena, en esta ocasión el personal fue bastante "tosco" y poco amable con nosotros. Un problema que tuvimos fue que cuando llegamos para hacer el check in (12 pm) dejamos las maletas encargadas por que no nos podían entregar la habitación hasta las 3 de la tarde (muy puntual, ni un minuto antes, para que lo tomen en consideración), salimos a pasear por Times Square, y cuando regresamos a las 3 para recibir las habitaciones y refrescarnos un poco, habían hecho cambio de turno y resulta que a algunos de nuestros equipajes les habían puesto otras etiquetas distintas a las de la tarjeta que nos habían dado para recogerlas, por lo cual con muy mala cara nos dijeron que debíamos entregar la otra tarjeta, afortunadamente, el equipaje traía nombre, y nos pidieron (de mala forma) identificarnos para podernos entregar el equipaje. También tuvimos que mostrar el ticket de algunas compras que habíamos dejado junto con el equipaje. Qué bueno que soliciten alguna prueba de que es tuyo el equipaje, por seguridad, sin embargo, los modos son los equivocados, nos hablaron sumamente mal, hasta de forma grosera, y lo que es peor es que fue por algo que fue totalmente su culpa, porque etiquetaron mal los equipajes. Sugiero que si dejan maletas en resguardo, se aseguren que los etiqueten bien, para que no tengan ese problema. En general creo que la ubicación vale muchísimo la pena, no obstante, el hotel tiene varias cosas por mejorar.

title: Great spot. Nice stay
text: Great central location. Updated, very clean, very quiet. Very pleasant, efficient staff. Stayed on 31st floor. No problem with elevators. Great city view. Breakfast was a little crowded but plenty of food. Very nice to stay in NYC. Enjoy.

title: My trip to NYC
text: The last hotel I booked was very disappointing- my view was a brick wall, and room was damp and musty. ( won’t mention name).  Hampton inn Times Square central was a wonderful surprise ! From the moment we arrived, we were treated like old friends returning home! The hotel and rooms were spotless. My view from 25 floor was awesome ! I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting NYC. It’s near EVERYTHING - shopping, restaurants, wax museum, ripleys, etc. can’t wait to come back to this hotel for my next “ mini- vacation from Staten Island.  We were in NYC celebrating my daughters 15 birthday, and I couldn’t have been happier with the accommodations. THANK YOU HAMPTON INN !!

title: We just loved this convenient Theater District hotel
text:
Last year I was in NYC at a another chain hotel a few blocks more south around 38st and didn’t like the area. But this Hampton Inn on 41st between 7-8th Ave was perfect! Much better area right in the theatre area. My wife felt very safe in this area during the day and evening. 

I liked the fact that the subway is a half block away as well as the Port Authority bus terminal where the convenient affordable airport buses are coming and going. The theatre district is full of fine restaurants and Hells Kitchen area is only a few blocks away. 

The Hampton is moderately priced and I like that they have complimentary breakfast each morning. Our two queen room was large and had a refrigerator. One convenience we missed though was a room safe. Service is pretty good by the staff.

title: Location, value, breakfast: zero complaints!
text: Perfect midtown location.We were in town to see shows and were within 8 blocks of all the theatres.Lovely lobby with unlimited 24/7 cold water & coffee plus refreshments for purchase.Olivia checked us in within 2 minutes.We wanted the option to hop down the stairs quickly, so we requested a low floor and got Room 409, a corner room beside the stairwell. We could've used the elevator but ended up using the stairs over half the time - we're young & fit & don't mind stairs, and it eliminates any issues with waiting for an elevator. Breakfast buffet is a HUGE perk. Super-friendly staff in the breakfast room, big smiles, hard-working- great way to start the day: waffles, eggs, bacon or sausage, fresh fruit, smoothies, cereal, pastries, yogurt, etc. Try to hit the buffet as early as possible to avoid the 9-10 AM chaos. Our room was ultra clean, contemporary. Comfy bed, quiet room. The subway entrances across the street are a huge plus- get the $34 7-day (no 5-day) unlimited metro card and it pays for itself quickly. Port Authority 5 min walk from hotel. We give this Hampton 5 stars and will recommend it often.

title: weekend in New York
text: Very convinient place. Free brekfast, but overcrouded during weekend. Free coffee and tea in the loby and in the room. Nice and freandly personel. Very clean room. It was cleaned in the morning during brekfast. High quallity wifi.

title: Great Hotel In Times Square
text: Really convenient location . Across the street from the Subway and Port Authority bus station which is the fast way to get to Newark Airport.  Complimentary breakfast is a real plus . Lobby has coffee and Water available 24x7 which is another nice perk. Close to Times Square, Penn Station, Bryant Park  and 5th Avenue.

title: Great Location, Small room
text: Location was great. . . Might be typical of a big city but service was nothing to shout about. . It wasn’t bad by any means. . Just that you’d expect a bit more for the price paid. The room I booked was advertised as a family room with 2 double beds. . . You’d probably want 2 queen sized beds to be comfortable.

title: Great location and staff
text: This is a good hotel location-wise, and the staff is great. The breakfast room can get very crowded, so I had to bring breakfast to my room more than once. Waiting for the elevator can be a bit challenging, but they are efficient once you get one. Avoid high traffic times or you will have quite a wait. They provide complimentary water, cookies, and a to-go snack in the morning, which is great. I would recommend.

title: Great Hotel,Great People and Great Location
text:
I really enjoyed this great location between Times Square and Hells Kitchen.We were walking distance like a block to Times Square and 10 Minutes walk from Rockefeller center,Grand Central and 15 minutes walk from Central Park.But We were a 5 minute walk from Hells kitchen for lots of amazing restaurants and shops at local prices.

FYI Many items are about 40% lower outside Times square and restaurant prices are about 30%. less.All a 5-10 minute walk away west away from Times Square.Hotel was clean and their hot breakfast buffet was a good budget extender with lots of good hot and cold choices

Staff was amazing with polite and a very helpful attitude.Special kudos to Luis who was amazing with his tips on where to go,shop and eat.He was a porter but acted like a hotel concierge.He was a great source of information Rachel at reception was amazing and because our flight came in early morning.We were dead tired so she arranged an early check in and had us resting earlier then normal.Great location and people.I will be back for sure on my next New York visit

title: Buona scelta a due passi da Times Square
text: Abbiamo soggiornato per sei notti in questo Hotel. Si trova a pochi passi da Times Square e molto vicino a stazione metro. Ottima accoglienza e disponibilità al desk (ci hanno anche sempre offerto bottigliette d'acqua ai nostri rientri giornalieri). Camera non molto grande per tre persone, comunque accettabile. La nostra al 29° piano aveva anche una discreta vista. Aria condizionata e TV. Perfetta pulizia. Colazione varia, ma relativo spazio insufficiente in considerazione dell'elevato numero di persone (sia per prendere o riscaldare il cibo sia per sedersi ai tavolini).  Prezzo sostenuto ma va considerata la posizione.

title: I heart this hotel
text: Great stay. Our family was made to feel like valued guests. Our room was not huge, but it was clean with new furnishings. Housekeeping and front desk were very attentive. And the breakfast was such a terrific benefit—good hot coffee made every day start strong.

title: Parfait!
text:
Nous avons réservé cet hôtel pour une semaine avec ma femme pour notre premier voyage à New York. 
L'emplacement est idéal, à 2 pas d'une entrée de métro (comportant plusieurs lignes de metro et du coup desservant tout Manhattan), Time Square est à moins de 5 minutes, et il y a tout autour de l'hôtel des restaurants et des fast-food. 
Concernant l'hôtel lui-même, il n'y pas grand chose à redire, le personnel est avenant, souriant, aimable. Notre chambre était spacieuse et toujours parfaitement propre, la salle de bain est assez grand et la cabine de douche pouvait accueillir 2 personnes. 
La salle du petit-déjeuner est certes un peu petite par rapport aux nombre de clients, il faut parfois attendre d'avoir une place, mais si on y va pas trop tard il n'y a pas de problème! Il y a beaucoup de choix pour le petit-déjeuner: gauffre a faire soi-même, muffin, pain de mie, beurre, confitures, 5 sortes de cornflakes, des oeufs (durs, brouillés ou en omelettes nature/fromage selon les jours), du bacon ou des saucisses, des fruits, des yaourts, de la salade de fruits, jus de fruits, lait café, thé etc...bref il y a beaucoup de choix ^^ 
La climatisation est le seul reproche que je peux faire sur cet hôtel mais le problème est identique dans tous les restaurants, commerces ou musées de New York: c'est beaucoup trop froid! on était obligé de mettre un pull lors du petit-déjeuner alors qu'il faisait déjà plus de 20°C dehors! La climatisation dans la chambre était souvent réglée de la même manière mais celle-ci peut être réglée ou éteinte. Nous étions au 14ème étage et nous entendions très peu le bruit de la ville hormis les sirènes mais rien de dérangeant non plus.
Il n'y a que 3 ascenseurs mais ceux-ci sont rapides et nous n'avons pas souvent attendu longtemps pour en avoir un. 
L'accueil de l'hôtel propose également et gracieusement des bouteilles d'eau de 50cl , idéal pour partir à la visite de la ville mais aussi la possibilté de prendre un sac avec un petit-déjeuner à l'intérieur si vous n'avez pas le temps de vous arrêter manger.
Je ne peux d'ailleurs que conseiller cet hôtel de part son emplacement et pour la qualité de ses services pour toutes personnes séjournant à New York. 
Pour notre part, si nous devions revenir à Manhattan, nous choisirions à coup sûr cet hôtel.

title: Ubicación excelente/Atencion al cliente deficiente
text: El hotel tiene una ubicación ideal, cerca de Times Square, 4 minutos andando, pero lo suficientemente apartado como para huir del bullicio existente de forma continua en esta zona, el hotel dispone de un desayuno bastante variado, siendo probablemente está variable junto con  su ubicación sus puntos fuertes. Los aspectos negativos que destacaría son la deficiente atención al cliente ofrecida por el personal de Recepción y su incapacidad para resolver problemas generados por ellos mismos en el momento del check in y el funcionamiento de los ascensores en hora punta.

title: New York Trip
text: Your hotel team were awesomely friendly, knowledgeable and helpful with our  questions.  They went above and beyobd our expectations and are an exception to your company.  We Thank You for a wonderful experience...

title: Wonderful 8 night stay
text:
Great location right next to several subway stations nearby. Times square and Broadway are right around the corner. So are most theaters and Bryant Park. Helpful staff and John the concierge is a keeper. Delicious free breakfast. Impeccable service and housekeeping (they actually respect when you display the "Do not disturb" sign on your door). Cheap laundry service.

Everyday they provide you with free beverages such as tea, coffee, hot water, fresh water all day long right next to the front desk. They even have a little grocery shop with snacks, ice creams, microwaveable hot dishes, laundry powder, first aid kits, etc. Very handy.

Decent bedroom size with very comfortable mattresses. Good bathroom as well. You won't regret it if you opt for the bedroom with a city view, above all at night.

We highly recommend this hotel and would go there again without hesitation. Well worth the price.

title: Muito bom
text: Fui com minha mãe e ficamos no hotel do dia 14/08 até 21/08 e adoramos. Serviço de quarto bom, café da manhã das 06:00 às 10:00 com muita opção gostosa (somente o espaço para sentar nas mesas que não comportaram muito bem o tanto de pessoas).O hotel é muito bem localizado, e o quarto que ficamos era de tamanho ideal, com secador, ferro de passar e cofre. Há chás, cafés, chocolates e água de graça próximo a recepção para degustar qualquer horário de graça. Amamos ter nos hospedado lá e com certeza voltaríamos!

title: Weekend in NYC for Broadway~
text:
Excellent find with a consistent hotel chain. Outstanding customer service, texts to confirm and answer any questions was a nice new feature. Clean, updated hotel. Right in the middle of everything. Short walk to Wolfgang Restaurant, across from the stage door to Aladin!
Easy walk to all Broadway shows and times square.

title: Hotel top!
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato qui la settimana di Pasqua. Tutto perfetto! Camera molto grande e pulita, letto comodo, vista spettacolare. Possibilità nella hall all’ingresso di prendere caffè/the a tutte le ore del giorno. Potete chiedere anche dell’acqua in bottiglia gratis alla reception. Fermata della metro appena fuori dall’hotel dove passano tutte le linee. 
Se mai dovessi tornare a New York questo hotel sarebbe di nuovo la mia scelta!

Thanks!

title: Cooling/heating system has to be revised
text:
Cooling/heating system is probably the worst noisy equipment I have found in an hotel in US. You will have the choice: trying to sleep in presence of this noise or switching off the system and having a warm temperature in summer or a cold one in winter. Secondly, when the system is in function a moldy odor is present, which means that the system needs to be seriously cleaned and the filter if any to be changed. This point is also important : it is related to questions de safety issues.
Finally I would suggest to inspect all the duvets because the hidden part of the duvet in my room included brown spots… Disgusting.
Maybe I am wrong but I think that this situation is not at the standard of an Hilton hotel and at the level of the price the customer pays for.
I hope to the hotel manager to make a good use of my criticisms.

title: Sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt, gerne wieder.
text: Die Lage ist super, die Mitarbeiter waren sehr zuvorkommend, wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Cityview und konnten im 28. Stock über viele Dächer schauen. Beim Frühstück mussten wir immer etwas auf Tischsuche gehen, haben dann aber immer etwas für uns 4 gefunden.

title: A great stay in perfect location
text: This hotel was in the perfect location for our stay in NYC - close to subway, Times Square, quiet, clean, helpful staff, good breakfast, good value. Super comfy bed and larger than expected room size for NYC. Highly recommend!

title: Hotel perfetto a Times Square
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel per le nostre vacanze estive, hall molto bella e ordinata con a disposizione 24h/24h di bevande calde come caffè, the e tisane ma anche acqua fredda per poter riempire le proprie bottigliette.
Camere abbastanza spaziose tutto molto pulito e soprattutto una splendida vista al 23esimo piano.
Colazione abbondante con varietà di cibo non proprio europeo (mancavano croissant e creme spalmabili) possibilità di farsi i tipici waffle americani.
Posizione ottima appena fuori dall' hotel è presente una metro con le principali linee.
Posizionato anche a pochi passi da Times Square!! 
Hotel perfetto!!!!!

title: Excellent in every way!
text: Just yards from Times Square so very convenient for transport links. - but surprisingly quiet. Good size rooms and breakfast was very good with a very good choice. Yes it gets busy at times but we always found a table. Would definitely use again if we went back to New York.

title: Very good but a "Glitch"
text:
Pros:
Location, comfort, breakfast
Cons: No mention about $20 a day incidental fee when we checked in until we questioned the extra amount.  A $48 "glitch" was added to our bill in which no one was able to explain how it got there.  Not enough elevators for staff and guests.  Hard to get an elevator when cleaning staff is doing their work (can't blame the staff).

title: Hotel idealement situé
text:
Avons séjourné 4 nuits dans cet hôtel
Idéalement situé au coeur de times square,proche du métro dans une rue plutôt calme
Accueil très impersonnel, un petit mot gentil du genre Bienvenue serait apprécié !
Chambre un peu petite pour 4 adultes,les lits sont beaucoup trop étroits
La SDB est toute petite et à 30cm du lit donc adieu l'intimité mais bon on est à New York 
Par contre on peut signaler la propreté de la chambre, bravo aux femmes de chambre et merci pour leur sympathie,enfin quelqu'un qui vous dit bonjour !
Petit déjeuner inclus très correct , il vous faudra un peu de patience pour trouver une table mais ça va relativement vite
Bravo à Benson qui s'occupe de nous comme un chef
Bouteille d eau à demander à la réception,nous n'avons malheureusement pas eu les happy bags que nous avions tous les matins au Hampton inn à Boston!
Nous recommandons cet hôtel

title: Ottima soluzione, comoda per ogni direzione essendo proprio in centro a Manhattan
text:
Business hotel moderno, non appariscente all'esterno come altri Hampton, ma ben curato all'interno. Camere mediamente spaziose rispetto allo standard newyorkese, dotate di tutti i moderni comfort. La pulizia è di ottimo livello e tutto il personale molto da disponibile e gentile. Forse sono un po' pochini tre ascensori su quasi 30 piani, perché in orari congestionati (come a colazione) la discesa potrebbe essere difficile, rischiando infatti di trovare le cabine piene: noi eravamo al 5° piano e spesso abbiamo preferito scendere a piedi,ma se sei dal 10°, ad esempio,in su...
Qualche piccola correzione sulla colazione (peraltro compresa nel prezzo, quindi un "plus"): in estate il locale e' congelato e bisogna coprirsi, visto anche che si mangia / e' un ambiente relativamente piccolo (spesso bisogna attendere che si liberi un tavolo prima di prendere i piatti)/ la zona di raccolta del cibo e' altrettanto congestionata essendo distribuita in pochi metri quadri/ infine, essendoci parecchio afflusso anche dall'Europa meridionale,non sarebbe male prevedere una maggiore varietà di prodotti classici delle nostre colazioni (assenza di croissant, biscotti,cioccolata spalmabile,diversi tipi di latte); peraltro i succhi ed i centrifugati sono ottimi.Lasciate invece perdere tutto ciò che credete caffè o simile, se siete abituati in Italia. In ogni caso è un hotel sicuramente consigliabile, anche per la colazione, visti i prezzi medi di un breakfast in qualsiasi locale.

title: Tres bon hotel
text:
Tres bien placé, les chambres sont spacieuses, propres et silencieuses.
Des coolies à volonté à partir de 17h.
Limite en place pour le petit-déjeuner à éviter >9h.
Le personnel est sympathique et le café/thé sont à volonté à l accueil

title: Marvelous Gem in Times Square
text: We experienced our best 48th Anniversary celebration at the Hampton Inn Times Square Central.  Lilly was at the desk and was extremely generous with us.  She was able to get us a room on the 7th Floor.  We had extra time to relax and prepare for our first Off-Broadway Show.  The location is fabulous-close to the Subway, restaurants, Times Square and other places of interest.  The free breakfast the next  morning was out of this world.  The variety of foods was phenomenal.  Darren was especially helpful in keeping the breakfast selection plentiful. We will be sure to book this hotel again-our experience was priceless.  The manager deserves accolades for running the best hotel ever.

title: タイムズスクエアの近く
text:
ホテルの正面玄関を出て徒歩3分でタイムズスクエアに着く、とても良い立地。
フロントで無料のコーヒーサービスがある。

title: All around Win!
text: From the time I arrived, I had fabulous service at the front desk with Tobo & Olivia, greeting us with water bottles & warm welcome! Benson at breakfast was also great!  Food was very good, varied each day & staff allowed us to stay a few minutes after end time to relax.  Hotel was clean, quiet & in a great location. My friend & I were traveling with our girls & were both very worried about the elevator situation. We had no delays over four days coming in and out at different times. Definitely will be back!

title: Great stay
text: Arrived here after a long journey from the UK. We were allocated our room but were a little disappointed as our Travel Agent had sent in a request for a nice view and also to see if they could do something special as it was my husband's 50th birthday, there wasn't anything special and the view was rubbish. We soon found out there wasn't a shower curtain so every time we showered everywhere got soaked. We mentioned the above points, and so did my travel agent and between Emanuel and Christina we were moved higher up in the hotel with a better view, and to make it special they had put a balloon, card and some cakes from Carlo's bakery,  that was amazing as I LOVE cake boss! This room was good but a little noisier than lower down but ok.  Breakfast was lovely and we never had to wait for a table, there was everything you could want even different hot options and waffle batter flavours every day. Coffee, hot and cold water available in the lobby every day. Great hotel all in all,  the only reason I gave it 4 was purely because of the noise. Would stay again. :-)

title: Great hotel
text:
My flight was canceled at JFK and I needed a place to stay as early as possible in the morning. The hotel told me to come and they would get me in as soon as they could but it would probably be around 12 PM. When I got there at 6:30 AM, they allowed me to have a free breakfast and the staff were so helpful and so friendly and they hurried as quickly as possible and were able to accommodate me and get me a room by 9:30 AM. A special thank you to Delia snd Emmanuel for making sure I got a room as early as possible and letting me have a nice breakfast while I was waiting. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. The location is perfect. It is on the corner of Times Square. I would recommend this hotel to anyone and I will definitely stay there again on my next visit to New York. Highly recommended! 

Patricia

title: Excelente Localização e pequenos detalhes que fizeram a diferença!
text: Excelente experiência, com uma localização excelente, pessoal simpático e onde o detalhe de ter na recepção bebidas permanentes e ao final do dia cookies quentinhos para mimarem os hóspedes fez a diferença. Recomendo! Voltaremos sem dúvida!

title: מלון המפטון בניו יורק
text:
מלון מצויין בגלל המיקום הנהדר שלו,
אנחנו אוהבים ללכת ברגל והצלחנו ללכת לכל האתרים המרכזיים מהמלון, מאוד קל לחזור אליו מכיוון שהוא ממקום היטב הטיימס סקוור.
בנוסף לזה המלון נקי, ארוחת הבוקר נהדרת!! העוגיות בדלפק הקבלה הטעימות ביותר שאכלתי!!!
השרות אדיב ומזמין, קיבלנו מהצוות המלצות נהדרות לבילוי בניו יוק.

title: Centralisé
text: Nous avons passés 1 semaine dans cet hôtel idéalement situé, proche de Times Square et à deux pas du métro, des commerces et des restaurants. Les chambres sont spacieuses, le petit-déjeuner copieux, le personnel disponible et réactif. Les services sont nombreux, tout est fait pour nous faciliter le séjour. Seul petit bémol : la clim en chambre est assez bruyante. Que choisir entre mourir de chaud et être réveillé par des bruits de ventilo ? Grand dilemme.

title: Welcoming arrival
text:
What a lovely friendly hotel. Very welcoming and helpful.
Rooms alittle on the small side but adequate. 
Breakfast was good and in the evenings there are muffins/ cookies available on reception desk along with help yourself hot drinks.
Great location.

title: Excellent room and staff!
text: Hampton Inn is known for their complimentary breakfast, but this hotel offers so much more.  From the moment we arrived, to when we checked out 4 days later, the room and staff were incredible.  This should be your go to ‘home away from home’ hotel experience in New York.

title: Location, Location, Location
text: While not a big hotel, it provides all the things one needs in a chain hotel. It is on a side street a bit of a walk, but not far from both Penn Station and Javits Center.  Rooms are not large but work fine for what you need. Don't expect anything too fancy. It is clean and the staff is very friendly

title: Ótima localização
text: Hotel nota 10 em localização- metro fica do outro lado da rua, 10 minutos da Time Square, quartos amplos, banheiro amplo com box, atendentes maravilhoso super bem humorados, possui uma mesinha na recepção com café, chá e água. A unica observação é com relação ao espaço do cafe da manha, que não tem mesas e cadeiras suficientes para o número de hospedes portanto muitas vezes é necessário fazer a refeição em pé ou ficar aguardando a liberação de mesas e cadeiras.

title: Summer stay
text: Stayed here for a second time. Lovely welcoming staff who always had time to have a word with you. Rooms are not huge but big enough. Clean and great shower room. Free breakfast was a bu us with a good selection of food. Tea abc coffee available all day. Not too far from Times Square and Broadway. Would stay again.

title: Great hotel in times square
text: We arrived at 9am in the midst of thunderstorm. When we asked if we could just check our bags, so we could explore nyc, we were offered the free breakfast. After breakfast we saw some sights and returned at 1230pm just to freshen up before yankees game.  Our room was ready for us, 3 hours early! Great staff, very friendly and helpful.  Great find in the middle of Times Square.

title: Great visit
text: The service is excellent from check in to breakfast and cleaning .We arrived early and they let uscheck in and We also had the breakfast after check in. I went to the  concierge she was very helpful . She help me plan out our days to beat the crowds ,with subway trains and sightseeing buses schedules and gave me maps . Our room was on the 30th floor beautiful view of New York,people in other reviews said elevator was slow but we never waited longer than 5 minutes.hotel was walking distance to theaters and time square , top of rock and many other attractions . Love the breakfast smoothies and the cookies in the evening.!photos are views from our room.We will be back!Thank You making us feel welcome

title: Mother/daughter vacation
text: Great location. Just a few blocks from Times Square. Walking distance to many of the sightseeing places and to all broadway shows. Always clean rooms and comfortable beds. Would definitely stay there again. Loved it!!

title: Great place to stay
text: Very nice place to stay and so close to Times Square with great comfortable beds and walk in shower. Very clean. Great breakfast with a lovely breakfast supervisor called Geraldine who is very friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay there again.

title: Great Stay
text: Great location. Rooms comfortable and clean.  Water and coffee in lobby were greatly appreciated after long walks around New York City. All staff were very helpful and friendly. Would stay here on next trip to New York.

title: Excelente escolha
text:
Bem localizado, mas distante o suficiente da frenética Times Square. Recepcionistas atenciosos e educados. Quartos de bom tamanho e silenciosos. Camas excelentes. BWC limpo e boa ducha. Amenities Neutrogena. Cofre no quarto. 3 linhas de metrô a uma quadra do hotel. Tem maleiro grátis.Tem água e café na recepção o dia todo.
Pequenos pontos negativos: Café da manhã um tanto cheio e elevadores na hora de pico também, especialmente para quem fica em andar baixo. Não tivemos problemas pois ficamos no 28ª andar.

title: Excelente relação custo benefício
text: Hotel que oferece qualidade e agilidade no serviço. Quartos confortáveis e de bom gosto. Kit de banho assinado. Excelente café da manhã com variedade de opções. Equipe de atendimento muito cordial. Certamente retornarei.

title: Family Holiday 2019
text: It is bang in the middle of Times Square: noisy, smelly and gritty. The staff were very good. Hotel is smallish. There is laundry on site. Hampton Inns have quite lousy breakfasts including this one. I would go back, but not soon.

title: Excellent Stay!
text: Great location. Excellent staff. Quiet rooms.  Best complimentary breakfast I have ever had. The cold water every day was very appreciated in the lobby.  NYC is HOT in July!  Stay on a lower floor. The elevator can take quite a while.  Don't miss going up to the rooftop.

title: Excellent!
text: I stayed at the Hampton Inn during the NYC heat wave. The hotel was very well appointed, very reasonably priced and the Staff was Outstanding.The entire staff was very friendly and helpful. Jeremy and Lily at the front desk were so professional and friendly. Geraldine, the breakfast supervisor was genuinely friendly and her staff were All very friendly and helpful. The hotel was spotless and the decor was very pretty. The rooms were very well appointed, the bathrooms were great. I'd definitely stay here again.

title: Good location
text: While the location of the hotel is good with easy access to the subway, theaters, and restaurants, there were a few negatives that kept me from giving the hotel a top rating. First, the housekeeping staff were very inconsistent during our eight night stay. Some days they left no coffee packets, other days they left all decaf, and one day they left coffee but no plastic insert to use the machine. The bottom sheet on the bed was too small for the mattress and kept coming undone at the corners of the bed. Also, we had to ask to have the sheets changed even though we were staying over a week. Second, the wait for the elevator was VERY long in the morning while breakfast was being served. Housekeeping (with supply carts) seemed to use the same elevators as the guests so that complicated the process. The final negative was the crowded breakfast area, lack of sufficient seating and the mediocre quality of the food. After a few days, we ate at places near the hotel. There were other positives in addition to the location. When it rained, the front desk staff loaned us umbrellas. They were both friendly and helpful.

title: Hôtel idéalement placé à Times square
text: A proximité immédiate de Top of the Rock, Empire State Building, Rockefeller center, gare centrale, Central Park, Intrepid Sea, Hudson River, Times Square. A 15 mn des principales attractions et des stations de métro à 200m. Musée Tussaud à 5 mn. Personnel sympathique et à l'écoute. La salle pour le petit déjeuner mériterait d'être plus grande vu le nombre de chambres.

title: Great Location
text: Great location, a few hundred feet from Times Square and easy access via subway. Staff is friendly and the free breakfast is a great way to start the day. Coin laundromat in house. Overall a great base for a visit to NYC

title: Great stay Manhattan..
text: This hotel has a great staff. Everyone was friendly, helpful and courteous. The complentary breakfast was always full but the staff kept the tables clean and they made sure the replenished the food fast.

title: Perfecta Ubicación
text: Si quieres un lugar donde todo quede al alcance para moverte sin carro, pues es una excelente opción a un buen precio y con las comodidad de los mejores hoteles. Visite la 5ta Avenida, times Square y fui al estadios de los New York Yankee sin problema.

title: Sehr zu empfehlen
text:
Sehr gutes Hotel in einer Spitzenlage in Manhattan. In diesem Haus ist man als Gast bestens aufgehoben. Das Frühstücksbuffet ist für amerikanische Verhältnisse Spitzenklasse und das ohne zusätzliche Kosten.
Wenn wir wieder nach Manhattan kommen sollten, dann dieses Haus.

title: Viagem em Família
text:
Hotel com excelente localização! 
Excelente atendimento. Quartos limpos camas confortáveis e trocadas todos os dias.  Amenitee de excelente qualidade disponíveis para o banho . 
Café da manhã um pouco tumultuado mas compensado pela qualidade do Buffet. 

Adorei .... vou indicar para amigos e parentes . 
Obrigada Hampiton inn Times Square Central

title: Outstanding Hampton Inn Hotel Manhattan
text: Thank you for asking. It's a fantastic place to stay here at Hampton Inn Manhattan/ Times Square NY. We are very grateful for the amazing customer service and the great breakfast with the friendly environment and staff! 👍😁

title: Great value in a great location
text:
I expected this to be a typical big city hotel—cramped and dirty with poor AC and bad plumbing. I tried to prep my family for what was in store. We were very pleasantly surprised!  The room was recently updated and immaculately clean. It wasn’t huge, but our family of 4 (two in their teens) did just fine. AC and bathroom were flawless.

The price might seem high for a Hampton Inn, but keep in mind that you’re in NYC. We have a friend who got us a room rate nearby for more than twice the price. We’ve stayed at that place before and know it’s in nowhere near as nicely kept.

A couple of things you have to know, and this is probably a big city issue more than a problem with the hotel—you have to anticipate the crowd/time. Go to breakfast early. Our first morning, we had an early tour so we had the place pretty much to ourselves at 7. The next day at 10 was a different story! (They do have food that you can just grab and go) The hotel has four elevators and maybe 26 floors of about a dozen rooms each. At peak times, you WILL be waiting for the elevator. Anticipate or take the stairs.

title: Location
text: We choose this hotel because of the location. It is a typical Hampton Inn. Clean with comfortable beds. The eating area is much too small for the size of hotel. So not a good value if free breakfast is important to traveler.

title: Good location and breakfast. Front staff got attitude issue
text:
Great location. Next door to time square and broadway shows.

Room is spacious.

Most front staff were nice and professional but this african american staff who does not have a name tag on his uniform was not up to standard. I tired to exchange some bills to coins for laundry with him and he took my money and just could not finish his chat with his asian female front desk colleage before he passed the coins to me... There was never smile on his face either. It took like 5 min to finish the exchange. Thats way too long and thr attitude is not acceptable for a hotel of this level.

title: Excelente localização
text: A escolha do hotel foi pela localização, muito próximo à Times Square, e também pelo custo/ benefício, Ficamos em um quarto triplo com duas camas de casal com café da manhã incluso e wi-fi. O café da manhã tem várias opções mas que não mudam, são as mesmas coisas todos os dias. Mas é excelente para iniciar o dia alimentado. Quartos mais altos são silenciosos. Ambientes limpos e atendimento cordial, em especial do Luiz que cuida do recebimento das malas e da Laura do Concierge. Elevadores são lentos e lotados na hora do rush...

title: Great experience
text: We had a great experience with this hotel. The staff are excellent and really looked after us. The room was a good size and very clean. Breakfast can be a challenge with the amount of people for the size of the room but the breakfast staff are outstanding and are always available to help. We will be back!!!

title: Convenient Location, Professional Staff
text:
This is a well managed, centrally located hotel convenient to all the Broadway shows and the events around Times Square. It has the convenience of a breakfast buffet like other Hampton Inns. It gets very busy in the mid-morning but the food is stocked and everyone helps keeping tables clear. 

The three elevators are constantly busy. Be ready for rush hour if you're checking out and need to grab a cab for a plane.

There is a concierge who can help with tickets though we didn't use any services.

The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable.

title: Hôtel parfaitement situé et très bien
text:
Hôtel très sympa, faisant partie de la chaîne hilton donc avec une équipe bien rodée. L’emplacement est parfait, juste à côté de Times Square mais ce n’est pas bruyant du tout.
A la réception, café, thé, eau à volonté, internet etc.
Salle de sport et buanderie au sous sol. 
Chambre très correcte, Sdb impeccable. Rien à redire.
Petit déjeuner: info importante, il faut y aller entre 6h et 7h30 car après il y a trop de monde. Concept assez marrant pour les français que nous sommes d’avoir des machines à gaufres. Sirop de maïs et non d’érable. Couverts en plastiques et assiettes en carton pour penser à la planète (et surtout réduire les coûts) mais bon après une journée on s’y fait. Large choix de céréales, pain, bagels etc..
Service de concierge.

title: Great Broadway Location
text: For this trip we planned on seeing Hamilton at the Richard Rodgers theatre.  This Hamtpon was approximately 5 blocks from the theatre, and right next to the theatre where as of Summer 2019 Pretty Woman is playing and right across the street from the theatre where Aladdin is playing.  The New York Port Authority Bus depot is right at the end of the street in case you plan on using public transport out of the city via bus.  However, if you are looking for hotel which is a good central location of Broadway plays, Time Square, the Garment District, etc., this hotel is a great central location.  Also, the hotel itself is nicely upgraded and modern.  As you would expect in New York, the rooms are smaller than the standard Hampton Inn, but they are not uncomfortable and are clean.  Also, the complimentary breakfast has a wide assortment of food options.  Please note the sign outside the breakfast room which lets you know when the breakfast room is the busiest.  Despite this, the staff did a wonderful  job of keeping the breakfast items stocked and the area clean. Overall, an excellent Hampton Inn experience.

title: Muy recomendable el hotel Hampton Inn central Times Square
text:
Hotel muy céntrico y muy bien comunicado por metro,  autobuses turísticos, a 100 metros de Times Square.
Ofrecen agua fresca e infusiones a la entrada, tienen servicio para guardar tu maleta el día de salida, nuestra habitación con vistas a la ciudad ha sido un rincón de descanso después de un día agotador.
Repetiría si volviera, no lo dudaría.

title: Birthday trip to NYC
text: Accommodations were exactly as stated.  Great location, comfy bed, nice hot breakfast, professional and courteous staff.  Location is perfect if you are going to see a Broadway show, shopping or need the subway.

title: I’ll be back
text: I’ve stayed here many times. It’s located right in Times Square. Subway station is literally one minute away. Broadway shows are all within a 10-minute walk of hotel. Everything is updated and clean. Staff are awesome. Continental breakfast does the trick. You can grab a bag to go if you’re in the run. Contains fruit, muffin, water, granola bar kind of goodies. You could save a few bucks elsewhere, but you’ll probably be disappointed. They will hold your bags if you arrive early or if you have to check out, but have touring time before getting to the airport.

title: Extraordinario
text: Llegamos al hotel fruto de la cancelación de un vuelo, puesto NYC era una escala prevista para más adelante en nuestro itinerario. Todo fue excelente. La habitación, de tamaño razonable para lo que es NYC preciosa. El baño súper amplio y con excelentes accesorios de tocador. El aire acondicionado perfecto. En una ubicación inmejorable, a 2 min a pie de times square. El desayuno estaba incluido, y era muy bueno. Pese al tamaño del hotel, los ascensores no hubo que esperarlos demasiado nunca, pese a estar en pleno Pride. El día de nuestra salida, que era muy temprano, nos encontramos con bolsas de desayuno "to take away". Quizás el único punto flojo es el espacio donde se desayuna, que esta abarrotado de gente y hay que esperar mesa. Habiendo llegado a NYC (por 5ta vez) a otro hotel más caro en la tarifa, concluimos que aquel tenía una extraordinaria relación precio calidad y lo recomendamos. ampliamente

title: buon hotel turistico
text: ottima location; è vicino al times square agli autobus hop on/off; è tutto un via-vai di clienti colazione discreta se si riesce ad andare entro le ore 7.30 dopo si rischia di dover consumare il pasto nell'atrio; personale molto gentile il concierge (una persona di età media) competente e servizievole

title: Perfect location in NYC
text: This hotel is centrally located in Manhattan between 7th and 8th Avenues. It's convenient to both Penn Station and the Port Authority. Our room was clean and comfortable. We were pleased with the front desk's recommendation to stay a corner room on a lower floor. It was quieter, and we could use the stairs instead of the small, crowded elevators. The breakfast buffet was OK (and free!), but became very crowded on weekend mornings.

title: Extremely high telephone charges
text:
A 10+ mins telephone call is charged for US$ 300. This is like a robbery.  

My handphone is not able to make a phone call for unknown reason so I use hotel desk telephone to call a Singapore number. No fee board of telephone charges is in the room.

When I checked out the hotel and was informed that this phone call costs around US$ 300. After negotiations, an "offer" of US$150 is still charged. I feel terrible about this.

Are we still live in Stone Age when a telephone calls cost you hundreds of dollars? If you want to charge a high fee, at least a fee notice should be put near the telephone to make your customer aware. 

The staff is nice and friendly. But the telephone charge ruined the experience.

title: My home away from home in NYC
text: Farrell, Lilly, and Kevin at the front desk went above and beyond to make our short stay incredible. The housekeeping staff were amazing as well. Thank you for taking such great care of us. This is my go to hotel in NYC because of the great staff and great location.

title: Great central location
text: The location of this hotel can not be beat.  So close to all of the times square attractions, the subway, and the bus terminal if you are arriving in on the Newark Airport Express bus from the EWR airport (just a half of a block walk from the bus terminal to the hotel).  We arrived before check in, and the hotel desk stored our bags in a locked room so that we could explore the city until our room was ready.  We chose a room on the second floor due to reading reviews about the hassle with the elevators.  We are glad we made this choice.  The convenience of taking the stairs (4 flights of stairs from the lobby to the second floor) during the breakfast rush made us very happy with our decision.  We did not see any problems with elevator wait times at any other point during the day throughout our one week stay in June though.  It is really just a concern at breakfast time.  On the first day, we lucked out and found one dining table open to eat at during breakfast.  The other days, it was so busy, that we just took our food back up to our room and ate there due to lack of seating.  Take note of the sign that the hotel posts about breakfast busy times - we found it to be pretty accurate, so to avoid a wait, go early!  The room was nice and clean.  The beds were okay - not the most comfy, but not the worst.  We were worried about street noise being on the second floor, but it was not a problem at all.  There is the occasional siren that you hear, but other than that, noise was not that bad because 41st street was not a particularly noisy street.  The only problem we had with the room was actually a pretty annoying problem.  Mosquitoes!  We kept finding mosquitoes in our room and I am highly allergic to mosquito bites - where the bites turn into welts, then bruises, then blisters - not fun.  Well, we would kill the ones we would see, but I still would get bit.  Then we would leave for the day and come back in the evening and find that the room had more mosquitoes!  I don't know how they were getting in.  We did notice that the windows to the outside opened slightly, so my guess is that housekeeping either opened the windows while they were cleaning each day which let in the mosquitoes, or they were traveling through the vents.  Either way, I have never had a mosquito problem in a hotel room like I did here.  No matter how many we would kill, there were more, and they kept biting me so that I would wake up with fresh bites each morning.  I did mention the problem upon checkout, so hopefully they can address where the mosquito problem is coming from and treat it.  However, even with the mosquitoes, this really was a lovely hotel and a very friendly staff - we really enjoyed our stay.

title: Wonderful
text: Everything was excellent. We arrived to New York and our AirBnb host didn’t answer our phone calls our messages to instruct us on how to enter the property. We called a Hilton hotel for a room they informed us they were fully booked and contacted Hampton in for us which was absolutely perfect for the night and breakfast was amazing. Thank you!

title: Fabulous Stay
text: My daughter and I just spent four nights here. The location is perfect. The rooms are wonderful, clean, and perfect in every way. Although we would have preferred to have two separate beds, they only had king-size beds available. That wasn't a problem at all. The bathrooms are great - good shower. Kind and friendly service, and good breakfasts. Honestly, the location cannot be beat. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

title: Location Location Location
text: Location was perfect.  Within walking distance to everything.  Room was clean, breakfast was busy and completely packed unless you go early but that is to be expected.  The breakfast staff worked VERY hard to keep up and keep the area clean.  Olyvia at the front desk was wonderful!!  She had very helpful advise and was able to answer all my dumb tourist questions with a smile.  Would stay here again.

title: My stay
text: Very nice hotel,very intelligent front desk staff ,very nice breakfast persons love my room the first day but I think as someone that travel a lot professionalism is something that I look out for and I didn’t fine that with supervisor and her staff they were talking Spanish which I fine is okay but too loud I was staying on the 7th floor which I taught being low it would be better but it wasn’t a part from that friendly staff but they need to know how to conduct there self

title: Amazing customer service!
text: This was our family's first trip to NYC and we had a wonderful stay at the Hampton Inn! All of the staff; Lilly, Hicham, Geraldine, Luis, and Joseph our bellman, were professional, patient with all of our questions, and genuinely kind people! We will be recommending this hotel to all of our friends and family!

title: A 5 Star hotel and stay w/o 5 star cost
text:
Everything about my recent stay was extraordinary.  I rate hotels vs other hotels in the same value/cost.  I arrived early and simply wanted to check my bag and return later and check in.  The gentleman at the front desk told me my room would be ready in a few minutes and invited me to have a coffee while I wait - my room was ready in 5 minutes! My room was spacious- for midtown NYC and very clean. The complimentary breakfast was equally as excellent. Every time I returned to the hotel I was always greeted with a smile and friendly words, whether it be the front desk, housekeeping or a bellman.  special shout out to Kris and Tobore at the front desk - outstanding hospitality!
An excellent stay and  hotel I have since returned to often and will again and again.

title: Hampton Inn Times Square Central
text: This is a very conveniently located property with a helpful and skilled staff. Just outside the heart of Times Square, this location is walking distance from TS, the subway, the theatre district, and a number of good restaurants.

title: Perfect stay! Perfect staff!
text:
Perfect place to stay in New York! Perfect staff! I would definitely come again! 

In the heart of Manhattan, two steps from the main places to visit during your stay (Times Square, 5th avenue, Broadway theaters, Central station etc.) and the most famous landmarks (Flatiron District, Empire State Bld., Chrysler Bld., UN headquarters, Central Park etc.).

Many subway stations on the corner to go everywhere (Brooklyn, downtown Manhattan, Harlem etc.), and only 10' walking from/to Penn station. I needed the subway just to visit Brooklyn and Downtown Manhattan (Wall street etc.) but I walk a lot. Anyway, the subway stations are in every corner and as I said they can bring you everywhere. Also there are taxis everywhere (Times Square is a few meters away, so...). 

There is always, coffee, water, tea etc. at the lobby which is very handy. Also there are usb charging points at the room, so you may not need US adaptors for your phones.

I was lucky and got a room with an amazing view, with skyscrapers and the first billboards as we approach the Times Square. The room and the bathroom are quite spacious, and the king size bed is perfect for a couple.

The staff make your stay very pleasant. Everyone is very kind and helpful at the lobby (reception), breakfast room, cleaning etc. Also, after check out, they allowed me to leave my luggage at a locker room and I was able to enjoy my last day. 

I would definitely come again, and I hope they will give me the same room!

title: EXCELENTE UBICACON Y ATENCION CONSTANTE!!
text: Destaco muy especialmente a Luis Luna, empleado del hotel de habla hispana. Siempre dispuesto a explicarnos los medios de transporte convenientes para recorrer la cuidad y algunos tips para hacer nuestra estadia muy agradable, volveria sin dudarlo.

title: Love this hotel!
text: great location, few blocks from Times Square,and the Central Park, wonderful staff and very proffesional - speacially the front desk personel - great room 100% clean, amazing breakfast (included in the price you pay for the room), coffee and tea 24/7, friendly, an office center avalable 24/7 (no fee).

title: Would stay here again!
text: Location was great.  Subway station was right across the street.  Staff was very courteous and accommodating.  Room was clean and beds were very comfortable.  Had an issue with a clogged drain in the shower.  Someone was at our door within 20 minutes of calling.  Lots of selection at the free breakfast.  Would stay here again and highly recommend it.

title: Perfeito
text: Ótima localização, com metrô na esquina. Perto da Times Square, porém numa rua tranquila. Café da manhã muito bom e nos horários de pico pode ser difícil encontrar mesa. Alguns hóspedes levam a bandeja para o quarto. Há também um pacotinho de papel no balcão da recepção para quem está com pressa e não vai conseguir fazer o desjejum no hotel. Os quartos são limpos e de tamanho razoável, com cafeteira, porém sem frigobar. Há três elevadores rápidos, mas algumas vezes estão lotados. Há computadores conectados a uma impressora no saguão, bem como café, chá e água a disposição. Todos os funcionários são gentis. Recebem encomendas de forma organizada. O hotel disponibiliza guarda volumes para deixar a bagagem enquanto espera o horário do check-in ou após o check-out. Há um pequeno terraço no alto do prédio que fica aberto até às 20h, mas não há mobília alguma. Quase ao lado do hotel tem uma taverna com pratos e bebidas muito bons a um preço interessante. Na esquina tem um Red Lobster e em frente tem um Mc Donalds. Tivemos uma ótima estadia e recomendo muito o hotel.

title: Great Stay
text: Great stay at this Hampton Inn. At first wasn't happy with room size, it was small, (city view king) and lack of some amenities - no mini fridge or microwave. Don't know if that's a code thing for NYC or not, unlike other Hamptons that offer them. Made our reservation directly, the woman on the phone was wonderful and so helpful. Upon arrival in late afternoon, valet didn't take long and helpful while we were putting things on cart to bring in. Yes it's a bit pricey per day for valet but much rather have my car to get there and go home. You don't take it out other than that. Had city view king size room with great view, especially  first day, only day we actually saw any sun, can't blame hotel for weather. When I first saw room, wasn't thrilled. Far smaller than any Hampton Inn room I'd had, felt a bit old, purple carpet needs to go, purple black out drapes don't exactly black out, they'reabout 2 inches too short so the light comes streaming in morning time, night time not too bad but the city lights definitely act like a big night light thru the drapes.Hotel pics show a king size room as having a comfortable looking sitting chair but when we got up there, it was only a work desk and chair. Coming to NYC there's a lot of walking and I wanted a comfortable chair to relax in and was shown as part of the room. Went down to the front desk to ask where said chair was, young woman said she didn't know what rooms had those chairs (?) but a manager was right there and immediately said they would bring a chair up to our room. To their credit, chair arrived in 5 minutes delivered by a nice gentleman from housekeeping. We smooshed it in next to the end corner of the bed as the room wasn't that big. Like to see less workspace size and rigid work chair and more of a nice true comfortable sitting chair to relax and enjoy that view with at the end of the day, especially for the cost of the rooms...yes I know it's NYC, rooms are pricey but for pricey I want it comfy. Not much room to put clothes away, 3 small drawers attached to work space desk and a closet. Kept our things in our suitcases for 4 days, used closet to hang up a couple of things. Bathroom, was spacious enough, housekeeping would just give us more towels when we asked. Was disappointed to start putting things out on the counter and realized there was someone's hair right by the hotel soaps and it wasn't mine. Countertop didn't seem clean rest of bathroom did. Broke out some hand sanitizer and wiped down counter and got rid of hair. The duvet didn't have the usual card on it as other Hamptons that say it's basically fresh and clean, always a nice touch to see but not this go around so far as a note but appeared clean. Elevators, in our 4 days we never waited anytime I would even consider close to being long and we were in and out of the building frequently and close to a top floor. Elevator was quick once we got in and selected our floor. Roof top observation deck bit of a let down, expecting more like a patio type but guess that's not possible up on a 32nd floor and there wasn't really a lot of room up there, but it's worth taking a quick look around. Bed, comfortable, shower, always hot water, room, much smaller than I expected a king city view would be. Quiet except for heavy slam sound of neighboring doors. For so many people being there, we had quiet nights. Breakfast was busy but we got in, got our food and we did find seating each day. Waffles are always available and cereals, fruit, muffins, yogurt, juice, coffee, teas, bacon, sausage, etc. It would be nice to offer scrambled eggs every day and then an extra option like the western omelet or plain cheese omelet but that's just personal choice. But still a little hint to the Hampton Inn for breakfast offering. Geraldine works in the breakfast area, she is sweet, happy and hard working. Tea, coffee, cocoa, cold water, etc available all day by registration desk. All in all for a first time stay, we enjoyed it. Hotel staff polite and helpful.With volume of people coming to front desk it can get hectic, but it's a customer service job, for the most part all the staff seemed customer service oriented. Not sure of other Hamptons in area, may check them out but overall this was a good experience, wish room was a bit more comfortable in size but location was fantastic.

title: Decent interior, horrible service.
text:
Decent enough hotel with atrocious front desk service. The second I checked in, I got nothing but derision from the woman I was speaking to. When I had a problem that was ultimately the hotel's fault, there was no movement from anyone at the front desk or the manager or even an apology for my inconvenience. 

Yeah, they provide beds, but hospitality is meant to be more than that. I won't be staying here again.

(Also, God help you if you have anywhere to be in the morning, because the elevators take ten minutes to arrive, if you're lucky.)

title: Viagem ideal
text:
Hotel excelente! Localização perfeita... perto de tudo! Times Square, restaurantes, metrô!! 
( Hotel tem na recepçao café, água e cookies. Um agrado!) Café da manhã bem completo! 
Excelente custo benefício!

title: Excelente para unos días en NYC
text:
Desde la ubicación hasta los detalles del personal, todo excelente. El desayuno muy bueno y las bolsitas preparadas para llevar algo de comer, muy buena idea.
El café y te las 24 hs viene muy bien, además de la comodidad ahorras unos dólares. La habitación para dos está bien, muy luminosa y con espacio para guardar valijas y ropa. Gracias a todos del Hampton Inn Times Square. volveremos !!

title: Posizione, Gentilezza, Colazione con waffle!
text:
Posizione eccellente, personale gentile, colazione ottima anche se la saletta è un po’ piccola. Ci si possono fare i Waffle caldi al momento. Disponibile sempre tè caldo o caffè americano o camomilla nella Hall. 
Terza volta che andiamo a New  York e questa location è stata la migliore.

title: Excellent
text:
Excellent hotel, location perfect, very helpful, informative staff. Made 5 days in New York a most memorable time. 
If you want to be in the heart of the action but also want a quiet comfortable nightsleep, this is the hotel for you.

title: SOPRAVVALUTATO
text:
Sono stata in questo albergo con mia sorella dal 31/5 all’11/6,
La pulizia della camera al nostro arrivo lasciava a desiderare dopo opportune mance ha funzionato. La colazione che tutti decantano era veramente inaccettabile tanto che noi spesso
l’abbiamo fatta fuori. Sarebbe bastato avere delle vere brioche
o del pane fresco piuttosto che tutti quei pasticci insapori.
E che dire del cestino con acqua e due dolcetti che fa la felicità di tutti, meglio solo acqua e usare il resto per migliorare la qualità della colazione.

title: Excellent stay!
text: Had a wonderful stay at the Hampton Inn Time Square Central location.  Everything was very clean and the staff was super kind and accommodating! We were able to check in early and then on the day we checked out the staff held our bags for us so that we didn't have to carry them around the city with us until we were ready to leave. I would definitely recommend staying here to anyone.

title: Good hotel but needs some changes
text:
I stayed recently in this hotel and In summary it is a good hotel, but have some issues that must be attended by managent as soon as possible if they want to receive a 4-5 stars review.

Issue #1, the curtains are not blacked out 100%, light enters the room from all sides, and as you may understand in times squares there is lights 24/7. Also the noise coming from outside is terrrible, some soundproofing would be much appreciated. I couldn’t sleep well because of this.

Issue #2, the elevators take a lot of time and are most of the times full. I think 3 elevators for all the floors and rooms is not enough? All 5 days of my stay it took me between 5 to 15 minutes (the worst day) to go down to first level from 19th floor.

Issue #3, on the last day of my stay I left 8 am my room and came back 4Pm, to see my room wasn’t cleaned up. This is unacceptable for so many hours they could have taken care of my room. An apology is not enough, I had to leave my room for a couple of hours to let the hotel to take care of this.

Would probably stay back again, but only if the management takes care of these issues, if not I would not come back again.

title: Great location and great rooms
text:
The hotel is conveniently located just steps from time square but is also quiet enough at night to rest well.  Decent size room and bathroom; nicely furnished.   Breakfast was good and although busy, the tables turn over fast.  
Enjoyed our stay and will definitely recommend!

title: Always love staying at Hampton Inns
text: This property is very convenient to so much in Midtown Manhattan, and feels safe, clean and comfortable, with great staff who are very helpful.  This in addition to the free breakfast, the quiet of the rooms, reasonable price point, the warm cookies in the late afternoon - it just brings you back every time.  The only thing I'd change is the music in the breakfast area in the morning - when people haven't quite gotten into the day yet, it was a little too caffeinated!  We were in town to see a show, and we'd  definitely stay at this property again.

title: back to hampton inn
text:
siamo ritornati a distanza di un anno in questo hotel e la recensione è sempre ottima.
ottima posizione, a 1 minuto da Times Square, vicino alla metropolitana, ristoranti e negozi.
molto apprezzati il caffè-the 24/24, il wifi e la saletta pc.
receptionist disponibili.
ottima colazione in orari molto ampi.
camera senza frigorifero e con armadio piccolo.
prezzo elevato.... (quasi 300 euro a notte in b/b) ma siamo a NY

title: Na Times Square....Gostoso este Hampton!!!!!!
text: Então....Gostamos ( eu e meu marido) de um Hotel com Café das manhã...Como já estamos na Terceira Idade nos permitimos certas "rabugices". Detestamos sair pela manhã procurando um lugar para tomarmos nosso café!!! Assim, começamos o Dia cheios de "vitalidade", andamos até 12 km por dia por esta Nova York dos nossos Sonhos. E, este Hotel atendeu mais ainda as nossas caminhadas. Além, de muito Central, colado a Times Square, a uma curta distância do Empire State Building e do Madison Square Garden, bem como das lojas na Quinta Avenida e dos teatros da Broadway. ...Possui um serviço que nos pareceu 24 horas de Café, Água, Chá na Recepção. Qualquer hora que saíamos ou voltávamos das nossas andanças lá estava nos esperando aquela água geladinha e aquele café revigorante....que muitas vezes levamos para o nosso quarto de tão robusto.
