Um Quarto sem muito luxo, mas muito bom....e principalmente silencioso!!!!!!! Recepção super cortes. Ah, e em cada andar tinha uma ice machine!!!! Ah,waffles deliciosos!!!  Somos as viagens que fazemos....Com Certeza!!!!!!

title: Great Location In Midtown NYC
text: The hotel is located near Times Square but is in a quieter street which was very welcome as this area is so busy and crowded. All the midtown sights such as Rockefeller Centre, Macy’s, Central Park, Grand Central Terminus are all within easy walking distance. Rooms are big and comfortable. The breakfast is plentiful and sets you for the day. There is coffee, tea and water available all day. Every member of staff is very helpful. Special thanks to Geraldine Meenagh who is the great lady who manages the breakfast room. She has a sunny personality and gave us some great tips regarding shopping and visiting sights. Also John, the concierge who arranged tickets for Jersey Boys at short notice and arranged a shuttle ride for us to the airport. He also gave us great advice re visiting sights and subway use. The Hampton Inn Times Square Central is suitable for couples, families and groups.

title: Good hotel centrally located
text: Good experience with efficient staff and breakfast at a reasonable price for ny city; good location ; would stay there again. Light was out in bathroom when we arrived but it fixed immediately as was table alarm clock.

title: As good as always
text: Comfortable and spacious rooms (rare in NYC hotels), friendly attention from the front desk personnel, great complimentary breakfast and, as a bonus, they offer to the passenger a bag containing a snack, a muffin and a small bottle of water at the front desk when leaving in the morning to explore the city. What else do you need?

title: Bit by something...
text: Nice, large, seemingly clean room. But the next morning I woke up and had 3 large, very itchy insect bites on my arm. I have inconclusive results from doctors as to what bit me, but I recommend checking your mattress before committing to your room.

title: Alle Gut
text:
Ich hatte bereits gute Erfahrung mit Hampton Inn gemacht, das wurde auch hier bestätigt. Zimmer + Bad war sauber, Personal immer freundlich. Generell ist NY zu teuer!
Das Frühstück war OK aber der Raum etwas klein + eng fürs Hotel.
Über alles ein angenehmer Aufenthalt

title: Très bien situe
text: Séjour de 5 jours avec mes deux filles ados. A 2 pas de Times square. Propre et personnel agréable. Proche de tous les lieux incontournables. Petit déjeuner copieux. Parfait pour séjourner à New York. Je recommande cet hôtel.

title: Brilliant stay
text: Great location.  Within walking distance to most tourist sites, about  a 20 minute walk to Central Park.  Subway easy to use.  Nice large room, cleaned daily.  Staff were very friendly and helpful, especially the breakfast staff, Geraldine Meehan in particular..a credit to the hotel.  This hotel should be at least a 4 star. Coffee, tea and cold water available free of charge 24 hours a day in reception which was very helpful.

title: Family vacation
text: Great location. Valet parking was expensive but seemed necessary and worth it in the long run. and Rooms were on the smaller side but maybe normal for NYC. Beds were double size and not very comfortable. The staff were helpful and friendly.  Good breakfast

title: pasqua a new york
text: Ho scelto questo hotel dopo aver letto molte recensioni positive e devo dire che non sono state deluse.camera grande considerando lo standard di new york,bagno e doccia enorme,letto comodissimo e camera al 20 piano molto silenziosa.Ottima anche la colazione,desidero solo fare un appunto,non ho trovato il latte caldo,ma mi sono rifatta con frutta e biscotti vari.Zona vicinissima a Times  Square e metro,quindi comodissima.Trovo poi molto positivo le bevande calde nella halll dell'hotel a disposizione dei clienti  e il cestino che la mattina viene dato gratuitamente con acqua,barretta energetica e muffie. se mai divessi tornare a New York tornero' sicuramente in questo hotel!!!

title: Really Expensive but Good
text:
My family (2 adults, 2 children below 8 yo) stayed here over a Memorial Day weekend.  The room was clean, well appointed, although relatively small. This could be expected due to real estate considerations.  There were lots of international visitors, which I don’t have a problem with except that there are some cultural issues with how you are supposed to wait in line.  The staff on site are very patient and friendly.  Parking should really be called “we’ll just store your car for you until you are ready to leave”.  It shouldn’t be an issue if you are ready to use public transportation.  Being right off Times Square is AWESOME.  Somebody pulled a fire alarm at 4AM, so we got to visit TSq in our PJs in the middle of the night.

Exercise some patience, and this is overall a great place to stay.

title: Amazing
text:
I am a travel agent from Israel and i stayed at the hotel last week.
Location was excellent.
The rooms are nice and clean.
Coffee, tea and water at the lobby free of charge.
Big breakfast.
Hotel should be rated as 4 stars.
I would like to thank Kris from front desk for a warm welcome ( i hope i will not need to change a flat tyre in the near future) 
I will recommend all my clients to stay at the Hampton inn time square central

title: Outstanding!
text: Nice rooms, great lobby, excellent service by all staff members. Having the hot meal each morning was perfect! Every thing was just great with the hotel.  The location was awesome, right by times square, and subway entrances on each side. Walking distance to everything.

title: Excelente Estancia
text: Fue una excelente estancia, el hotel tiene muy buen servicio por parte de los Colaboradores, siempre amables y dispuestos en ayudarte. El hotel en general está limpio así como las habitaciones. La ubicación también es excelente por la cercanía a Times Square y Broadway. ¡Definitivamente en mi próximo viaje regreso al mismo hotel!

title: Amazing Staff and fantastic Hotel
text: I’ve been to New York City many times, bit I have never, ever had hotel staff treat me so well. Everyone from the front desk to the guys who help with baggage to maintenance to sweet Geraldine are incredible. They actually treat you as if you are the only guest. We traveled with our high school seniors and it was fabulous. The breakfast is one of the best I’ve experienced at any hotels; the location is superb and the hotel is very, very clean!  To your managers, staff p, etc-keep doing what you are you doing because you are doing it RIGHT! We also loved the cookies:)

title: Good location!
text: The location is the selling point. Overall the hotel is nice and clean. My only complaint is the elevators...they start at the top of the building and work there way down often arriving to your floor completely full! Would recommend staying on the lower levels just in case you have to take the stairs.

title: Great place to stay in NYC!
text: Location is outstanding.  Right in the middle of theatre and subway trains.  Very nice breakfast included.  Clean rooms and friendly staff. Will make this my first choice when in the city. Felt very welcomed and secure location.

title: Dale Giles
text:
Wow what can I say this hotel and its staff are magnificent, the rooms are beautiful and very comfortable, the breakfast team lead by Geraldine are fantastic and could not do enough.
If you want a place to stay in New York this place is top of the list.

title: Family trip
text: Hotel is clean. Staff is very friendly. Location is convenient to Times Square and the subway. Hotel street is quiet with less foot traffic. All stores and restaurants start at the corners. Felt safe with no problems.

title: Fantastic location & fab hotel with lovely staff.
text:
This is a perfectly placed hotel to explore New York. There is a subway across the road, so you can be anywhere very quickly! Not scarey & very cheap & easy to use. 
The staff at the hotel are lovely, especially Geraldine & Darren, who work in the dining room at breakfast time. Our room was perfect & you must go up to the 31st floor viewing point & eat the free cookies in reception!! There are 3 quick lifts, which can feel like they stop at every floor sometimes but you end up having a laugh & a chat with other guests whilst waiting! It wasn't really a problem, just funny. We would definitely stay here again & ❤️ New York.

title: Excellent location and satff
text: Great value for the $ fantastic central location. Super staff and very helpful! If you are staying midtown and need a great hotel this is one to consider! Super close to Times Square and the theater district!

title: Find another hotel
text: I am a Hilton Diamond member, so maybe I am harder on Hilton properties because some places I go, I am blown away by the customer service.  Not here.  They didn't even offer the minimum of what they are supposed to offer their Diamond members.  It took us over an hour to check in; just so many issues with elevators and breakfast.  However, aside from Kris at the desk, most of the employees were amazingly helpful and kind.  I've stayed at several other Hilton props in TS; this is my least fav.

title: Excelente hotel
text: Excelente hotel, servicio muy amable, ubicación perfecta! Muy cerca de una parada de metro, bien comunicado con toda la ciudad. No se escuchan ruidos, muy tranquilo. Desayuno buffet espectacular!! Repetiremos seguro!!

title: Great location!!
text:
Location was great, able to walk to a lot of different areas.  Breakfast was your typical complimentary foods, which worked great for us...
Beds are double not queen so be prepared for that upon booking, other then that the rooms are small but clean..

title: EXCELENT
text: The employees were super nice, they gave us tips to know the city, help us to check in early. The room was comfortable with a great view. We loved it!!! Excellent Hotel location, close to everything. and excellent costumer service. Thank you, you made our trip very special!!

title: Great location!
text: We loved staying here and will definitely be back! Clean rooms, great variety of breakfast items, even “to go” bags if you were rushed for time! The staff was very helpful and friendly! Oh, and the location was the best...just a few steps out the door and you are right in the heart of Times Square!

title: Very happy with this hotel
text: I was extremely happy with my hotel stay. After staying in several different hotels in NYC I would not think of staying anywhere else but here again. Great value, friendly staff, exceptionally clean, delicious complimentary breakfast. I greatly appreciated the 24 hour complimentary tea, coffee, hot chocolate, water.

title: Adorei o hotel
text:
Estive lá com minha família e achamos o hotel é muito bom! Staff sensacional, com destaque para Tobo, Sergio e Chris. Café da manhã bem servido e mesas constantemente limpas. Delicioso cookie servido de tarde. Café, chá e chocolate quente a vontade 24hrs. Não cobram taxa de resort como outros hotéis em NYC e a localização é ótima. Ficaremos lá na próxima vez.
ass.: Paula, mae da Gabi

title: AGRADABLE, SIMPLE, BIEN UBICADO
text: Bien ubicado, a pasos de Times Square. Habitaciones buenas, standard. Lo malo es el comedor, es muy pequeño para recibir a tantos huèspedes, dos días tomamos desayuno de pie. El desayuno estaba bien, pero el problema fue que nunca había espacio en el comedor

title: Excellent emplacement
text:
En plus d’être bien placé, la chambre est grande et confortable.  Il y a des rangements, pratique quand on reste plusieurs jours. 
C’est très propre. 
Le personnel est très serviable et gentil. 
La salle du petit déjeuner est petite, ça bouchonne...

title: Hôtel très bien situé
text:
L hôtel est très bien situé à 2 pas de times square à côté de port authority (gare routière). Les bouches de métro proche. L hôtel est propre les chambres spacieuses et bien équipée. Le petit déjeuner est ees bien et varié . La salle de restauration est un peu petite par moment ça pose souci. Mention partuculer a Benson pour son accueil et son sourire le matin. 
Seul petit bémol la personne de l accueil ne nous a donné aucunes infos et pas forcément agréable le jour de notre arrivee. Heureusement pour nous ce n était pas notre premier séjour.
Hôtel que je recommande sans problème.

title: Great location & comfortable accommodations
text: This is a very convenient location for theatre, near subway, and an easy walk to restaurants.   At certain times of the day, build in "wait time" for the elevator.   The complimentary breakfast was very nice, but the breakfast room gets very crowded & hard to find a seat during busy times.   Special shout out to Farrell (front desk) & our maid, Caroline.   Both were super efficient as well as personable.

title: Great Location IN Time Square
text: The hotel and rooms must have been updated recently...very clean, staff friendly and efficient, delicious hot breakfast to start the day, coffee and tea available in the lobby and room. Safe location and IN Time Square. Definitely would stay here again!!

title: NYC Trip
text: Very nice hotel with great staff. A little more originality in the complimentary breakfast would be nice (I don't think the choices have been changed in years). The rooms are nice but the beds are small and are in need of replacement. The staff are great, very helpful and friendly.

title: Best hotel in Midtown
text: Such a great hotel. My favorite in NYC. Very clean, great location, very friendly staff. Within walking distance to theaters, Times Square, Central Park, etc. I was so pleasantly surprised. Definitely will stay here again.

title: SUPER STAFF
text:
The Hampton staff makes this hotel special.  Everyone was extra friendly and helpful - front desk, maid staff, the guy busing the tables in the dining room.  Front Desk guy (Kris) even stepped outside to direct me to the subway entrance.  Rooms are spacious, especially considering the Times Square location; clean and very quiet. I never heard my neighbors.  
Complimentary breakfast is a bonus in NYC.  One thing I would suggest is to perhaps change the service in the breakfast area to cafeteria style - Might move faster  Plus, it was sad to watch a handful of greedy folks clean them out; in some cases appropriating enough food to last for the day (or several days). Breakfast area is crowded enough to make one think that people are coming off the street.  However, the staff keeps up (with a smile); I rarely saw them run out of anything.  
Convenient to everything - This will be my go-to hotel on future trips.  :-)

title: Suited needs, but please review your plastic useage
text:
spent a few days in NY with 23yr old daughter so wanted something central - reasonable
All staff polite , helpful, friendly
beds comfortable
breakfast  good plus, it is basic but enough to fill you, have it early or becomes over crowded 
location central
noise - not too bad but get a high floor. we were lucky no noisy guests on our floor apart from a couple on instances. if you did then you would hear everything- sound proofing not great
Lifts, ok if not busy time (7.30 - 9.30) . If it is busy it can take ages. We ended up using stairs as much quicker- we were only on 6th.
24 hr tea / coffee in lobby + biscuits in afternoon was great.

on the down side , I am not any eco warrior or green fanatic BUT  all cups/ plates/ cutlery are paper or plastic (coated like coffee shop cups) all food waste , plates cups get thrown into same bin. - somehow I doubt recycled . all cups in room are individually wrapped in plastic bag. UNNECESSARY, wasteful and bad for planet

title: Great Stay
text: Great hotel in Times Square & reasonable priced! Would definitely stay  again. John, the concierge, was extremely helpful, knowledgeable, also fun to talk with. Got us great seats at the shows we wanted.

title: Comfortable stay
text:
It was nice and comfortable stay. Hotel location is very good. Rooms are of decent size and we had city view room.
Check in was quick and staff is friendly.
Also, free breakfast was an add on. 
We had no trouble with the lifts and with the breakfast area.
Hotel staff arranged an airport taxi at a reasonable price.

title: Posizione fantastica e colazione inclusa!
text:
Posizione fantastica a due passi da diverse linee di metro (anche quella diretta verso l'aeroporto JFK) e a 4 passi da Times Square, davvero fantastica! La colazione inclusa è un plus non da poco per un albergo a New York, visti i costi che fanno pagare gli altri alberghi (dai 20$ ai 35$ a persona al giorno!). 
Per la colazione erano disponibili sia i waffle, sia alcuni dolci, sia omelette e bacon (alternate con omelette alle verdure e salsiccette o piccoli hamburger). Non mancano caffè (americano),the e succhi. 
A disposizione dei clienti veniva gentilmente offerto un lunch box ogni giorno con una bottiglietta d'acqua, snack e muffin alla banana. È anche possibile chiedere delle bottigliette di acqua alla reception per affrontare la giornata in giro per New York.
Sempre a disposizione dei clienti, 24h su 24h, acqua fredda, caffe e the. L'albergo è dotato di WiFi che funziona perfettamente in ogni punto dell'hotel e nella propria stanza. 
Per il mio soggiorno ho chiesto che mi venisse data una stanza ai piani alti con una bella vista sulla città e sono ststo accontentato con una stanza al 21esimo piano con vista a sud di Manhattan, davvero bellissima! 
L'unica piccola pecca è che la stanza non era molto grande e aveva una piccola cabina armadio. Alla fine del nostro soggiorno abbiamo chiesto di poter lasciare le nostre valigie per alcune ore in hotel, senza alcun problema. 
Al check-in abbiamo dovuto lasciare una carta di credito con una pre-autorizzazione come deposito, che verrà restituito nel giro di 7-10 giorni lavorativi.

title: 快適に過ごしました。
text:
5泊いたしましたが、大変快適に過ごす事が出来ました。
地下鉄の駅にも近く何処に行くにも快適でした、強いて言うなら朝食がもう少しレパートリーが有れば良かったと思います。

title: Like a bus station
text:
While it’s true the people who work there are nice, when the hotel is full, it has the atmosphere of a bus station. The three elevators routinely stop on every other floor in the morning so that a trip from a high level can take 10 minutes (assuming you can manage to squeeze in). The other night, there was a big crowd waiting in the lobby for only two working elevators. Mobs of families and tourists pile in for breakfast every morning so there are few free tables and lines of people for the food, which is so-so (example: fresh fruit that doesn’t taste fresh). And the rooms are relatively small.
If you can afford it, the Times Square Hilton across the street is 10 times better.

title: Excellent Hotel in great location
text: We stayed here in late November for five nights. The location makes for a perfect base to explore. Most days we walked everywhere, but the underground station is right at the end of the road. Plenty of places to eat nearby. The breakfast was a great start to the morning with plenty of choice, we never struggled to get a table as people are coming and going all the time. My only issue is the amount of single use plastic that is being used in there each morning. The hot drinks in the foyer are just what you need when you come in from a long day, and if you timed it right there’d be warm cookies on reception too. The room was spacious (for NY) modern and the bathroom great. We would definitely stay here again.

title: Convenient location, breakfast included, comfortable rooms
text: This is a great location, if you are good with walking, although we did use lyft and cabs for longer distances. The breakfast that is included is extensive and dining room, though large, can get very crowded. Coffee, tea, hot water are available all day in the lobby and a nice touch are the bags of water, muffins and nutri grain bars that you can grab on the go. Rooms are comfortable and showers are big and have a small step into them. Staff was both friendly and helpful.

title: Buen localizacion, excelente atencion.
text: Un Hotel con esplendida localizacion, cerca a Time Square, estacion de metro y muchos restaurants en el area.  No le falta nada.  El desayuno fue suficiente y fue un desayuno basico.  Tiene disponible café y te 24 horas que en epocas frias es un buen detalle.  El unico inconveniente es que en ocasiones el lugar del desayuno esta muy concurrido y encontrar una mesa require algun tiempo y paciencia.  Los ascensores en la manana estan muy ocupados y lograr bajar a desayunar require de tiempo y paciencia tambien y ni modo de usar las escaleras si estas en el piso 17.  Las habitaciones modernas y agradables. Se puede recomendar.

title: Posizione comoda
text:
Siamo stati in questo albergo nel periodo pasquale, era ovviamente pieno ma non abbiamo avuto problemi, a parte qualche minuto d’attesa per un tavolo a colazione.
La nostra camera era al nono piano, la vista era brutta (mura di costruzioni vicine) ma la camera era sufficientemente ampia, ben insonorizzata, sia all’interno che all’esterno.
La posizione è ottima, a due passi da Times square e con la metro quasi di fronte.
Non c’è frigo bar ma a disposizione 24 h banco con caffè e il necessario per il the. Il pomeriggio erano disponibili ottimi cookies, davano anche acqua in bottiglietta è un sacchetto con acqua, muffin e barrette, utili durante la giornata mentre eravamo in giro.
La colazione piuttosto varia, tipicamente americana, ma con presenza di yogurt, frutta fresca, porridge.
Non c’era il bidet nel bagno, come ovunque all’estero.
Personale disponibile, wi fi gratuito in camera (non è scontato a New York).

title: Great Experience!
text: The location is wonderful...a bit away from the complete chaos!  The staff was very friendly and helpful!!  We enjoyed our stay very much and would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone!  We would consider staying again for sure if we are in the area!

title: A Great Property Made Greater by an Outstanding Staff
text:
As a coordinator for a small group trip to New York City this hotel suited all the needs for price, location, and facilities.  I am a fairly faithful Hilton Honors Guest, so I most often make reservations on line.  Shortly before we traveled, I wanted to ensure our rooms were in close proximity, and even, perhaps, adjoining.  Although it is possible to do this “in a little box” online, I opted to call the hotel directly.  I spoke to Olivia, who was at the Front Desk.  I explained the situation and she explained the configurations and possibilities.  At that time there was no availability, but Olivia assured me she would note the request and that they would make the appropriate accommodations should there be cancellations and changes.  
When we arrived, I merely gave my name and confirmation number.   The clerk replied with a genuine smile, oh yes, Miss *** your rooms are ready, we were able to make the appropriate changes and you have adjoining rooms.  I looked at her name tag, and it was Olivia.  She took care of the situation, remembered our conversation, and greeted me in a warm and friendly manner.  Throughout our stay she was most helpful, almost thinking one step ahead of our needs.  Every hotel should have at least one Olivia.
	Although the hotel is fairly good size, it is set up in a way as to not be overwhelming.  There is a comfortable well-lit lobby area, suited for gathering and snacks.  Beverages are always available.  I particularly liked that one must use a room key in order to access the buttons in the elevator.  This is a good security feature.  
	The Hampton breakfast buffet was busy, but the staff kept right on top of things.  The food was always fresh, and the associates were efficient at clearing tables keeping the area clean; and they did it all with smiles. 
	The rooms were very clean, and the housekeeping staff very friendly and helpful.  They were discreet in not disturbing, yet efficient in offering supplies and doing daily cleaning.
 	One in our party became ill.  Olivia and the rest of the front desk team were most helpful in providing things we needed, telling us where the closet urgent care was located, and so forth.  The manager allowed us to keep one room through the afternoon until we had to leave for the airport so the patient could rest comfortable.  I put this in the category of going above and beyond.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone searching for a place to stay in the Times Square area.  The property is wonderful, but the staff totally outstanding.

title: Pasqua 2019 a NY
text: L'Hotel è in una buona posizione, con vicine varie stazioni della Metro. E' una struttura di 31 piani con circa 11 camere per piano, di dimensioni adeguate, per chi non avesse troppe pretese. Le stanze sono ben isosonorizzate tra di loro, ma non per quel che riguarda i rumori stradali. Noi eravamo al 9° piano. Forse bisognerebbe avere la fortuna di essere più in alto. Letti confortevoli, anche se un po' piccoli. Se chi viaggia, viaggia con figli al seguito e si è di stazza importante (sopra i 90 kg e più di 1,80 di altezza) potrebbe avere qualche difficoltà a sistemarsi, visto che le stanze hanno letti king-size, cioè letti a 1 piazza e mezzo e non matrimoniali tradizionali. Le logiche commerciali, comprino gli spazi e quindi il confort. Uniche pecche gli ascensori, poco adeguati al traffico e la colazione, molto americana e poco europea in un ambiente piccolo, per la dimensione dell'albergo. Se si vuole mangiare con calma ed in pace, bisogna fare colazione prima delle 8. Gli asciugamani: un po' striminziti quelli per la doccia. Personale professionale, competente e disponibilissimo. Una cosa gradita, visto che non c'è il minibar in camera, è la disponibilità 24H di acqua, caffè e bevande calde gratuite alla reception. La foto del sito sono veritiere e quindi danno una buona idea delle camere.

title: Amazing service by Tobo!!!!
text:
Just checked out from my room. I cant say enough thank you to Tobo, and if I were to rate him only, its be 10 !!!! But I had one weird incident. I checked in
 And was lacking sleep so I was asleep. Around  5pm, someone started knocking on my door, about 3diff times which woke me up, I looked thru the door hole, and looked like it was a male staff with towels. I told him I dont need any towels several times, then he walked away. That kind of scared me a bit since I didnt ask for anything. I was traveling alone, and I am petite, so made me feel a bit uneasy.  But first floor staffs were all amazing. Location is great, would stay here again!!

title: Hotel super bien situé à Times Square New York
text:
Hotel avec petit déjeuner inclus
Situation idéale pour visiter NEW York
Il est situé à Times Square, dépaysement garantie,
Il permet de visiter NY à pied (à mis chemin entre Central Park et le quartier de little italy) et si à la visite à pied vous gonfle, alors une bouche de métro est situé au croisement de rue suivant.
WIFI de superbe Qualité, à 4 personnes en meme temps pas de bug et du coup cela vous permettra de planifier vos itinéraires du lendemain sur place...
Pensez à demander des bouteilles d'eau a l'accueil elles sont gratuites.
Accès proches des Gratte Ciel Empire State Building à 15 minutes à pied
Hotel situé au milieu des théâtres
Nécessaire pour lavage et sèche cheveu dans les salles de bain avec douche bien grande...

title: Ótima localização
text: Ficamos super Nem no instaladas. Atendimento muito bom. Espaço ótimo. Localização perfeita. Café da manhã bom. Próximo a todos os musicais. O que mais gostei mesmo foi a localização.  Vale a pena. Preço justo

title: Excellent Location
text: Excellent location center of Manhattan with all needed facilities and nice breakfast to start off the day.  The room was clean and comfortable for few days stay.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.

title: Great
text:
Stayed for a week in this very good hotel.  
Staff are great, friendly and efficient.  We had a room a ninth floor with two double beds plenty of room for three. 
Excellent location; close to subway and many attractions.  
Plenty of choice for breakfast although my one complaint would be the breakfast room is not big enough especially when school groups are in.

title: Really nice hotel, with one caveat
text: The hotel is really nice — it’s not a luxury hotel, but it is more than comfortable, and the rooms are well designed and laid out. The breakfast is generous. The one downside: at busy times, it takes forever for the elevator to come. You literally need to budget an extra 5-10 minutes in the morning.

title: Perfect location and amazing staff
text: Thanks again to the staff of this hotel.  Once again we had a wonderful stay.  I would like to recognize Olivia and Ferrell at the front desk and Benson in the breakfast cafe.  Thank you for taking such good care of us.

title: Perfect for a family
text: The location is ideal and staff super helpful.  Thank you Dennis!  They really want you to enjoy your stay.  I was amazed by how they can care for so many people so quickly.  Set off the main area on a quieter street.  Family had an exceptional stay. It was so so easy!

title: Pleasant Surprise
text:
Stayed for 4 days prior to a cruise over the St Patrick’s Day week-end and although completely booked out the breakfast worked well and lift wait time was acceptable.
First night was on the top floor which was a bit noisy due to the air conditioning units on the roof and surrounding buildings. The management were excellent and the room was changed the following day.
Concierge was very helpful and bottled water was available from reception on a needs basis.
The breakfast was adequate and acceptable with waffle machines and a variety of fruit cereals and hot dishes.
The location was fantastic and we had easy access to Times Square and the Theatres. NYC was very busy due to St Pats so it was fantastic to be able to walk to most venues without relying on public transport.
The rooms are modern and appear to be recently updated and the room was serviced daily.
Fire alarm one evening could have been handled better by the duty staff as communications to guests in the foyer was minimal and most of us relied on second hand information. But in saying that all good and confirmed false alarm by the NYFD.
Fantastic stay, reasonable price, great location and helpful staff.

title: Family trip to NYC
text: my husband, myself and 2 kids stayed here while visiting the city for a few days.  I don't write reviews often but we were so happy with our stay her and I wanted to take the time to share it.  The location was perfect and the staff was very friendly.  It was a pleasant surprise when we saw they have a coffee/hot chocolate/ice water bar for guests.   We used this on our way in and out every day.  they also had a cookie tray at the desk each night.  the cookies were fresh and a nice snack on our way back to room.  We also were very happy with the continental breakfast.  Very nice breakfast!  we would definitely stay here again!

title: Family trip to NYC
text:
An absolute gem of a hotel in the heart of Times Square. All attractions are within reach as the Port Authority bus station is a 2 minute walk. I'd definitely recommend staying here. 
Complimentery breakfast is a great way to start your day off. 
The staff are always on hand to help out with any queries. 
We'll defo be back..😊

title: Todo perfecto
text:
Hotel muy bien ubicado, muy cerca de Times Square. Las habitaciones son bastante amplias y cama muy cómoda. La pega que le pondría es la presión del agua de la ducha, que es bastante floja. 
A todas horas hay café y agua para beber y también ponen galletas y magdalenas para picar. 
El precio es elevado, pero para ser Nueva york está muy bien. Desayuno muy variado.

title: excellent service
text: I made a reservation here by mistake.  There are many Hampton Inns in the city and I reserved this one when I was supposed to be part of a group at another Hampton Inn.  I didn't realize it until I arrived but the mgr was so nice and understanding.  I wasn't charged for the stay and was able to change my reservation to the correct hotel.  I will def by staying at this one next time I am in nyc - thank you!!

title: Un bel hôtel et une chambre avec une vue magnifique
text:
Hôtel très bien situé au coeur de manhattan. Chambres confortables et propres
 Pratique de pouvoir prendre le petit déjeuner sur place ( juste un problème de monde certain matins / aux nombres de tables proposées.
Personnels très sympa et aux petits soins pour rendre notre séjour des plus agréables

title: Excelente
text: O hotel atende todos os quesitos fundamentais para uma hospedagem satisfatória, limpeza acontece de verdade, café da manha farto e variado para um café americano, localização excelente,metro ao lado e terminal de ônibus, times square ao lado, e varias lojas,   fiz muita coisa a pé, fui pro central park e fui a macy's, a  pe. Atendimento excelente, da recepção ao rapaz que guarda as malas. Só gostaria que minha solicitação de late check out fosse atendida ou meia diária fosse liberada, tive que deixar as malas na recepção da manha as 10,  e fui fazer compras, retornei somente as 10 da noite para seguir pro aeroporto. No geral recomendo e voltaria com certeza. Sempre que vou pros Estados unidos (Miami, orlando) fico na rede Hampton, sempre impecável.

title: Bourges
text: Nous venons de passer une semaine dans cet hôtel, il est magnifiquement bien placé, petits déjeuners copieux, très bien insonorisé, je le recommande à tous et surtout le personnel très sympathique et très accueillant, hôtel situé en plein cœur de New York au pied de Times Square

title: Great Hotel
text: Cant say enough about how great this hotel was. We got to check in early the staff was fantastic. Its quiet and safe and the location is so close to everything. Its a win for sure!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! The fresh cookies in the lobby were nice after a long day out and about. The breakfast was very good as well. It was spring break but the staff kept up with the volume of people.

title: Central, clean and very nice staff but no soundproofing
text:
If you need total silence to sleep like me then avoid this hotel.
We had a room on the 12th floor with the window facing the street. 
You can hear the cars and ambulances from 6am. There is also a drummer playing regularly somewhere around the place. There is not only outside noise but also inside noise. The doors of the rooms don’t have any dampening and you hear them slam at night. In addition our room neighbors (rooms are connected by a door) were partying around midnight and we could hear all laughs as if they were in the same room.
So one point less for suboptimal soundproofing.
The other minus point would be the complimentary breakfast missing any kind of vegetables.

title: Great visit
text: This is a very nice hotel.  Valet parking was super easy.  Our room was ready early.  We were greeted at the front desk by THE nicest employee, Farrell.  Our room was extremely clean and quiet.  The bed was exceptionally  comfortable and we slept very well after a busy day.  The hotel is very close to Times Square and Broadway so you can walk everywhere.  I would definitely stay here again.  Breakfast and free WiFi was also included.

title: Good location; great staff
text:
Walk west to the end of the block and you are kitty-corner from an entrance to Penn Station and the subway.

Rooms are small, adequate.  When the building was built, in some instances the contractors did a poor job, e.g. the cabinet over the sink is positioned so low that the hot water tap can only be turned half way!

The best part is the staff.  Helpful and gracious.  

All you can eat breakfast is decent.

title: Great location in Times Square
text: Very pleased with location. Staff extra friendly. Breakfast was great. Even green waffles for St. Paddy’s day. Room was comfortable and they provided a fridge for my medicine will stay there again. Convenient hit beverages plus afternoon cookies. Provided luggage storage.

title: Très bon hôtel
text:
Je n’ai pas été déçue de mon séjour dans cet hôtel. La chambre est spacieuse et pour NY il faut le souligner. La sdb très bien agencée n’est pas très grande mais largement suffisante pour deux personnes. Par contre pas trop d’intimité car la porte n’insonorise pas grand chose (c’est tjs mieux qu’une porte transparente comme c’est bcp le cas à NY).
Niveau bruits rien à signaler: nous étions au calme en plein Times Square et c’était plaisant après une journée en plein Manhattan. Notre chambre était au 19eme étage donc ça aidait.
Le matin nous attendions pas trop les ascenseurs sauf le week-end end et là nous avons dû descendre à pied!
Le petit dej offrait l’essentiel : yaourt, fruits, céréales, tartines, beurre et confitures, un choix de salé (omelette avec ou sans porc selon les jours) + boissons chaudes.
Il ne faut pas s’attendre à un petit déjeuner international, on y fait vite le tour mais c’est pratique avant de partir en vadrouille.
Pratique aussi les ordinateurs à disposition pour imprimer les docs de voyage et les petits sacs offerts par la réception contenant eau et muffin pour la journée.
Je recommande vraiment cet hôtel surtout que le king size était très confortable et la chambre très bien nettoyée tous les jours.

title: Wife’s Birthday
text:
Booked this hotel as part of a package via virgin holidays as we have stayed in these hotels in Canada a few times and knew exactly what to expect. 

Wasn’t disappointed when we arrived. Quick check in from very friendly reception staff. However, when we arrived in our ‘king room’ number 401, we soon realised it was no bigger than a small single at best. The king bed took up nearly all the floor space with Not much left for 2 people and bags. 

We did ask reception for a room move and was given another on the opposite side of the corridor and up One floor to number 504. Perfect. A much better king room with a lot more floor space. Wasn’t a problem for the staff and were more than happy to accommodate us. Ace. 

As usual there is a breakfast on until 10am, free coffee all day and night and warm cookies come out around 5pm. Nice. 

This hotel is a perfect location for Times Square and has a subway about 30 metres away, perfect for getting round the city. Also, the Port Authority Bus Terminal is literally 1 block away for links to the airport. Sweet. 

Really enjoyed our stay in New York on the whole but really enjoyed staying at this hotel. 

Many thanks to the staff

title: vraiment RAS !
text:
J'ai réservé 4 nuits et cet hôtel m'a permis de passer de bonnes vacances.Tout d'abord emplacement idéal pour être au coeur de NY, chambre spacieuse, propre, literie très confortable ( king size !), taille de la salle de bain pas minuscule du tout, Insonorisation correcte, j'étais au 21 étages dont pas de bruits de la rue.
Petit déjeuner varié et bon ( mention très bien pour les appareils à gaufres !!). Personnel sympathique et aimable. A l'accueil vous pouvez trouver à n'importe quelle heure de la journée du café chaud, de l'eau,...J'y retournerai sans hésitation !!

title: Un hotel estupendo!
text: Un hotel muy bien situado y con una relación calidad precio excelente, pero tienes que madrugar un poco si quieres evitar las colas en el desayuno, así que si no te importa madrugar este es tu hotel en Manhattan!

title: No coração de NY
text: Um ótimo hotel que combinado a uma boa tarifa torna-se uma excelente opção na Big Apple. Próximo à Times Square e ao lado do Metrô, o que facilita o acesso a qualquer ponto da cidade. Quarto bem conservado e muito limpo. A ducha é sensacional. Sem refrigerador, mas disponibiliza água gelada, café, chá e chocolate no lobby. A ducha é sensacional. O café da manhã é bom, oferecendo o básico para o desjejum. Colaboradores empenhados na missão de bem atender o hóspede. Tivemos 2 agradáveis dias no hotel.

title: Overnight stay in NYC
text: Clean room and great location..... staff (front desk included) even at a crowded breakfast, one employee, Ciena, was very personable and extremely helpful..... she made me start my day with a Smile ......thx Ciena !

title: Overly Nice
text: Upon arrival and talking with the lovely young lady we informed her we were in NYC For our 30th Anniversary!  We left for dinner and upon our return we found an amazing goodie bag full of treats and a card,

title: Excellent Hotel in NYC
text: Excellent place to stay in NYC.  Within walking distance of Times Square and pretty much everything else we wanted to do.  The complimentary breakfast had a great variety of "real food" and was always well stocked.

title: Très bien
text:
Hôtel très bien situé. Bon rapport qualité prix pour New-York.
Chambre familiale spacieuse et bien insonorisée. Clim un peu bruyante.
Petit-déjeuner correct mais salle de petit-déjeuner trop petite.
Personnel accueillant.
A recommander.

title: Stay at Hampton
text: Our stay at the Hampton was very very nice. The staff was very friendly and the hotel was clean and safe. You can't beat the location! It was steps away from Times Square and steps away from some of the amazing Broadway plays in the town. I highly recommend booking here!

title: Helpful courteous staff
text:
This was our second stay in the Hampton Inn.The location is ideal and the staff are very helpful. Special thanks to Geraldine in the dining room.   Our room was smallish but it didn't matter as we were out all day. The king size bed was comfy so we had no trouble sleeping. Having a hairdryer in the bathroom meant that I didn't have to pack my own in the suitcase. Good shower and the towels were changed every day. Enjoyable breakfast with lots of choice. We found the hotel to be very clean however the outside area under the canopy looked a bit grubby. 
If we return to New York,  we would certainly go back to the Hampton Inn.

title: Clean, safe and overall good hotel
text:
We got a great deal with this one. On the 18th floor, breakfast included, Wi-Fi and lots of power outlets in the room. Great connections everywhere, wonderful staff and hot beverages available in lobby at all times. Very clean room, soft sheets and dark curtains on windows. Any necessities you can get from reception as complimentary which is great! 

Downsides are the breakfast which I would NOT recommend to people with children. Very unhealthy and sugary, causes diarrhea. Also the cleaning service knocked on our door for 4 times in 3 hours although we are checking out the very same day at 12- you would think they’d check the room situation before they try and come in.

title: A Celebration to Remember
text:
My friends & I were celebrating our birthdays and we wanted a clean, safe hotel with a good central location. Like it’s name, this hotel fit the bill! One of my friends flew in on the red eye and the hotel allowed her to check in as early as 9AM, with no hassle. It was a great way to start the trip.

The staff was nothing but friendly and helpful. And the location really can’t be beat. You’re just a few blocks from Times Square, the 42nd Street Subway and steps from any number of Broadway shows. I’ve already recommended this hotel to several friends and will be staying here again.

title: Nice location, average hotel
text: Pricey hotel for the stay. Location was great, room was tiny for a family of four. Only had two full size beds which were tiny.  Housekeeping staff was below average. Elevator skipped our floor OFTEN!!!  Do NOT stay on the 23rd floor!!

title: Nice hotel in Times Square
text: Nice hotel in Times Square. We had a clean room. Staff was friendly. Room was nice. Great value. Would recommend this place to stay. We came as a family to see my son’s High School orchestra perform at Carnegie Hall.

title: Great place to stay
text: We were very happy with this hotel. Very friendly staff and always helpful. Big shout out to Benson who was working the breakfast with a smile and just didn't stop working. Room was very clean and the location was awesome. Big thank you to all the friendly staff. Keep it up.

title: This is a great place with a great location.
text:
Great location. Friendly and helpful staff. Rooms are clean, updated, and roomy.
Just steps away from a Subway station (7th Ave.&42nd st). Half block to Port Authority. Walking distance to Penn Station & MSG.
Located in the center of the theater district. 3 blocks to Time Square (proper).
If you've ever had to purchase breakfast for your family at a NY hotel - then you already know how awesome the Hampton Inn complimentary breakfast is.

title: Great place to stay in Times Square!
text: This was the perfect location if you want to stay in Times Square. And breakfast is included! My daughter and I loved the make your own waffle station. The room was nice and very clean. I would definitely stay there again.

title: Hotel absolutamente fantástico
text:
Me hospedei com minha família (4 pessoas) de 22/03/2019 a 31/03/2019 neste hotel. Já havia me hospedado em duas viagens anteriores no Hampton Inn Times Square North, da mesma rede, então já sabia mais ou menos o que esperar do hotel.

Localização do hotel é fantástica, em local praticamente estratégico. A rua é pouco movimentada, mas ao lado esquerdo se localiza o Port Authority e ao lado direito você já tem uma estação de metrô logo na esquina e se subir três quadras já cai na Times Square. O hotel fica bem no coração da cidade!

Anteciparam nosso check-in para 13h (ficaram com nossas bagagens para podermos passear enquanto não dava o horário) e ficamos hospedados no 25º andar, com duas camas de casal. O quarto é muito bom cabendo quatro pessoas, quatro malas grandes e quatro bagagens de mão de maneira muito confortável.

A limpeza é excelente e fornecem xampu, condicionador, sabonete para banho,  sabonete para a banheira, tudo da Neutrogena. A ducha é muito gostosa também.

O staff é extremamente amigável e simpático e sempre te atendem como se fosse um amigo ou membro familiar. Procuram te ver satisfeito e solucionar seus problemas. Aqui vão alguns destaques dos profissionais do hotel que seria injustiça de deixar de mencioná-los em minha avaliação: Benson, Farrell e Luis. Parabéns pelos competentes empregados e pelo treinamento dado a eles.

Frente a recepção há uma bancada com chocolate quente, vários tipos de café e água gelada durante 24h. No início da noite, a recepção serve cookies deliciosos. É possível usar um dos três computadores que ficam à disposição, juntamente com uma impressora.

O café da manhã é muito bom também. Sugiro chegar mais cedo para evitar grandes filas e não ficar sem lugar para sentar. Mesmo com o alto fluxo de hóspedes, o staff sempre mantém o café farto e não deixa faltar nada, sempre repondo os alimentos e mantendo o local limpo. Muito bom! Uma única sugestão é variar o cardápio, pois acaba-se enjoando um pouco das opções oferecidas.

Há, também, um rooftop no hotel que permite ter a vista de alguns prédios da cidade. Um lugar muito bonito de ficar à noite para observar a cidade de Nova York iluminada.

Acredito que o único porém do hotel seja a questão do elevador. Eu não tive muito problema com isso, pois, como me hospedei no 25º andar, maioria das vezes pegava o elevador vazio. Porém, na hora do rush, como pela manhã e início da noite, você pode acabar esperando alguns minutos para embarcar.

Resumo da obra: localização fantástica, staff excepcional, ótimas instalações e um ótimo café da manhã. Me hospedaria no hotel novamente com certeza e recomendarei para amigos e familiares!

title: Makes Times Square Bearable!
text:
This Hampton Inn has become one of my favorites. I was really reluctant to stay in Times Square while traveling for work, but because of prices, this was my best option of Hilton properties/central location. This Hampton Inn is located right across from an entrance into the Times Square/42nd St. Subway, which was fantastic for me since I was traveling all over the city and needed a large selection of subway lines at my disposal. The complimentary breakfast had a large variety, great selection of coffee/creamers, but the downside was limited seating in the breakfast area for large crowds. 
The hallway outside the elevators on my floor was a little small and cramped, but my room was clean, beautiful bathroom, and well maintained. 
The front desk staff was excellent - they were knowledgable and efficient and did not judge when my dinner was a box of oreos and Haribo gummy bears. 
Times Square has limited non-cheesy dining options, so you'll feel a little limited there, but my stay was excellent for the hotel and the money. I definitely recommend for anyone needing subway access.

title: Wonderful getaway!
text: Wonderful location in Times Square.  Hotel staff were all very friendly and accomodating and the free breakfast was delicious!  Also, there was free coffee, hot chocolate and bottled water available any time in the lobby.  I would definitely stay there again!

title: excelente, muy buena eleccion
text: un hotel con infraestructura nueva, habitacion muy amplias, camas comodisimas, el desayuno super variado, tenes  lo que quieras para desayunar. detalles como cafe con saborizadores y cookies en el lobby para que puedas tomar cuando llegas de recorrer la ciudad o durante la mañana en el mostrador de check in, arman bolsas tipo viandas,con snacks para que puedas llevar en tu excursion o paseo por la ciudad...la ubicacion es excepcional, a una cuadra de la estacion de subtes times square, que conecta todo manhattan y brooklin....a solo 2 cuadras del famoso times square y a pocos minutos a pie de central park, empire states, bryant park, biblioteca, rockefeller center, entre otros...es un hotel altamente recomendable... excelente !!!!

title: Great Place to Stay
text:
We stayed one night to be close to the Lyric Theater to see Harry Potter and the Cursed Child.  The location is perfect, just around the corner from the theater (you can enter the Lyric on 42nd). We arrived from our other NYC hotel around noon and they allowed us to check in early which was fantastic.  The people at the front desk are super helpful and polite.  I heard lots of people asking really basic, almost silly questions to the staff and they were so nice in their replies.  We had reservations for dinner at Tony's in between the shows and were able to come back to the hotel to relax before we had to go back to the second part of our show. 

There is free coffee, hot chocolate and tea in the lobby which is great.  The front desk helped us reserve a private car to JFK (so easy - $75) and we ate the free breakfast buffet around 7 am.  There were people there at that time but it was not crowded at all.  The breakfast opens at 6 am.  Rooms are fine, pretty standard but clean.  Bed was comfy and it was quiet on our floor.  We did see alot of teens in the hotel so I think large groups do come to stay and could get rowdy but we didn't see  that.  The elevators were readily available to us and we did not have to wait long.  There is so much food nearby and the subway is just down the block.  I was against staying in Times Square for our entire trip and stayed on E. 40th street for the rest of our stay but I do regret that now.  This Hampton Inn would have been a perfect place for the entire stay, so convenient and with a good vibe.  Oh and at the front desk they have a treat bag with water, a blueberry muffin and a granola bar which you can take with you if you don't have time for breakfast.

title: If You Must Stay in Times Square...
text:
I called the wrong number (for Times Square Hilton), but their helpful representative (Manuel L) still found our Hampton group reservation and patiently set me (and a co-worker) up. 

I arrived at 5:00 PM exactly, expecting a quick check in.  I was third in line; but after 25 minutes, we had not moved an inch.  Finally found out (by asking) that their system was down and nobody could check in.  These things happen, but the reason I stayed overnight (rather than commute) was so I could shower and change between a conference and a work dinner.  Instead I went directly to the dinner and was in the same outfit for 16 hours. They did check our bags at the front desk, so at least I wasn’t carrying that around.

I checked in around 11 PM by a super-friendly staffer (Jeremy N). There were snacks in the lobby (I didn’t get a good look), the room was clean, the bed was comfortable (it seems like a newer location). 

Pros:	
Great location (lots of bars/restaurants/transit options) - if you must stay in Times Square
Reasonable rate
Friendly staff

Cons:
Probably should have a back-up procedure if the system goes down
Not many amenities (understandably)

title: Outstanding Customer Service
text: We came for the weekend with my daughter and had a fantastic time.  I cannot tell you how kind and wonderful the staff at this hotel is.  They helped us out with whatever we needed and treated us as if we were family.  I would gladly stay here again simply because of the customer service.

title: Reservation rate issue
text: The reservation rate dropped considerably. Being a Hilton Honors member, I contacted Hilton directly and the hotel manager and was told nothing could be done. I believe there is always something that can be done to make it right for the customer.

title: Great stay!
text: Wonderful location, excellent staff, clean room, amazing breakfast! Great value for the price! Nice quiet room facing an alley but worked perfect for us! Will be staying here again! Walked almost everywhere, restaurants and shows close by ( as well as a Walgreens for cold medicine!!) we had a great time!

title: One night quick stop
text: Stayed for an extra night in NYC so changed hotels and stayed here and it was a really unexpected pleasure. Hotel was clean and our room even though we did have a brief A/C issue that was quickly resolved was very comfortable and the bathroom was huge. Also it is very close to Time Square and many other places to visit. I would definitely stay again maybe even longer if the rate of $140 available for a Friday night again.

title: Great Value
text: The hotel was great. Busy lobby but quick and efficient check in. We were allowed to check in early (11:30 am). Very close to the subway. 10 minute walk from Penn Station. Easy to get to shows. Internet was good. Breakfast gave hot and cold options. Benson, who works very hard in the breakfast area, was pleasant and very helpful with cleaning the tables. Room was clean and quiet. We stayed in room 1901. They held our luggage for us on the check out day since our train didn't leave until 2:00.

title: Very good location / Reasonable price
text:
The location is very good, 1/2 block from Times Square and from subway stations.
Room/Bathroom looks like new and very clean.
Internet - average
Breakfast included, not an executive breakfast , but it has good options of hot and cold foods.
I’d stay there again with no doubts.
I recommend the hotel.

title: Fantastic hotel and staff
text: Very clean rooms. They had  Koehler bathroom fixtures. There were No bed bugs! The hallways are a bit small when navigating the luggage trolleys out of the elevators but that was it. The location was right in the middle of everything we wanted to experience

title: Great Experience!
text: The hotel is in an excellent location to Times Square, broadway shows and public transportation. I enjoyed the tea and coffee in the lobb each day. I will definitely stay at this hotel again in the future! Highly recommend!

title: Great Location, kind Personal
text:
I stayed with my friends, the location is amazing is literally 3 minutes walking from times square, the rooms are spacious and have everything you need, the size of the towels can improve they are too little.
Jeremy from Front Desk was very kind and attentive.
The breakfast is fine and have options but the best of everything is the 24 hrs coffee and tea.

title: Outstanding NY Hospitality Best Evah !!
text: I was not going to expect much but I received more than I expected from this Hampton Inn Times Square Central.  The front staff was very congenial and helpful with information and ideas and places to eat ( Farrell, Kriss, Christine, Johnny, Rachelle) The breakfast was hot, filling and clean ... thanks to the service personnel Benson and Darren !  I will definitely come back here for the cleaniness, the modern elevators, and the closeness to walking to Times Square, Port Authority, Bus Stops and Subway entrances!  We were not lacking anything !  A small but lovely view from the roof top open from sunrise to sunset (maybe 8pm).  If the hotel is available for a similar price I got from Booking dot com (` $172 a night with taxes/fees) I would definitely go back again.

title: Harry Potter Play
text:
I was in New York with my wife and daughter for the weekend to see the Harry Potter play. The Hotel was conveniently located around the corner. The play was phenomenal as were the accommodations!
The hotel really exceeded our expectations from the time we arrived which was early on Saturday morning. They stored our bags until our room was ready and invited us to join the breakfast that was underway. The buffet was tasty and satisfying after a long flight from Los Angeles. 
After breakfast we went on a scouting expedition to get the lay of the land and loved how close we were to everything around Times square! This place is well located for the theater district and many great eateries. 
The hotel staff was excellent and very gracious, always greeting us and asking if there was anything we needed to make our stay more pleasant. The room itself was smaller than I imagined but otherwise very comfortable with beds and pillows that ensured a good night sleep and an incredible city view.
We didn't need a car as everything we were interested in was withing walking distance or a short cab ride away. By the time we left on Monday afternoon we were well rested and thoroughly pleased with our mini vacation. We will definitely stay here again on our next visit to the big apple!

title: Excellent Choice near Times Square
text:
This Hampton Inn was on 41st right off 7th Ave which was very convenient to the Times Square/ Theatre district areas. The 42st subway entrance was right across the street. Since the hotel is on a side street, buildings blocked a lot of the light and noise that came from Times Square.
The hotel itself has been refurbished and looked well taken care of. The rooms were very small, but to be expected in the city. We chose to stay on an upper floor, so we had very little traffic noise which was also nice.
The breakfast was typical for Hampton Inn's. Some hot eggs, meat of some kind, breads, bagels, muffins, yogurts, fresh whole and cut fruit, oatmeal and make yourself waffles.
We used digital check in and digital key, so we walked through the lobby, onto an elevator and up to our room. We did have to stop at the desk to get the wifi code.
For convenience, we would stay here again.

title: Perfect Location
text: This hotel was perfect for us.  Right in the middle of Times Square and within walking distance to the theaters, shopping, tour pick up locations, restaurants and everything we wanted to do! We highly recommend and would definitely stay there during our next visit to NYC!

title: New York City
text: We  had a wonderful trip the hotel was awesome we couldn’t have asked for more everyone was friendly and helpful.  Everything was so easy and convenient this was a great location, it made our sweet 16 party very rememberable.

title: Espetacular
text: O hotel é muito bom, o atendimento impecável, café da manhã com muitas opções, sugiro apenas descer mais cedo para conseguir lugar, senão tem que esperar um pouquinho, o quarto é espaçoso e limpo.A localização é perfeita do lado da Port Autority , onde vc tem metrô e ônibus interestadual, estação de metrô na esquina , lojas e restaurantes , farmácia, do lado da Broadway. Ah, tenho que destacar que na recepção todos os dias tem uma sacolinha com água, cookies, biscoitos e barrinha de cereal para vc levar, além de um espaço com café, chá e biscoitos , tudo free.Voltarei novamente.

title: Melhor localização
text: De modo geral, o hotel é muito bom. A localização sem dúvida é o ponto de destaque. Praticamente em frente ao metro e com bastante opções de lojas e restaurantes. Na minha opinião o único ponto negativo foi a qualidade do chuveiro. Tinha pouco volume de agua.
